atk-s0301a:430_1: Aṭṭhame idaṃ hi taṃ jetavananti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgato evamāha.
atk-s0301a:431_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa kathento kammaṃ vijjātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:431_4: Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:431_8: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:431_9: Etena maccā sujjhantīti etena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0301a:432_2: Yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena samādhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0301a:432_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati.
atk-s0301a:432_4: Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0301a:432_5: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0301a:433_7: na therena uttaritaro nāma atthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:435_2: Ekacco hi attano vasanaṭṭhāne bhikkhuṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvāpi na vandati,
atk-s0301a:435_3: aññattha gato vihāraṃ pavisitvā sakkaccaṃ vanditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karoti – “bhante,
atk-s0301a:435_6: paṭibalā mayaṃ ayyānaṃ yāgubhattādīhi upaṭṭhānaṃ kātu”nti.
atk-s0301a:435_8: Atheko thero tassa gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0301a:435_9: So taṃ disvā aññena vā gacchati,
atk-s0301a:435_17: yena samannāgato adāyakopi dāyako viya paññāyati.
atk-s0301a:435_21: “kiṃ mayhaṃ pādā rujjantī”tiādīni vatvā silāthambho viya khāṇuko viya ca thaddho hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a:436_3: Diṭṭhe dhammesa vipākoti tasmiṃ nibbattabhavane diṭṭhe dhamme esa vipāko.
atk-s0301a:436_4: Samparāye ca duggatīti “yamalokaṃ upapajjare”ti vutte samparāye ca duggati.
atk-s0301a:437_0: Vadaññūti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā kiñcāpi tuṇhīva honti,
atk-s0301a:437_12: Ubhinnampi vā etesaṃ tato cavitvā puna samparāyepi duggatisugatiyeva hotīti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:439_3: Mānusaṃ dehanti idha pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni eva vuttāni.
atk-s0301a:439_9: tesaṃ therānaṃ tvaṃ kusalaṃ anavajjaṃ bhāsasi,
atk-s0301a:439_12: Taṃ te dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti te therā taṃ dhammaṃ idha tumhākaṃ sāsane jānitvā.
atk-s0301a:443_2: Sīlaṃ yāva jarāti iminā idaṃ dasseti –
atk-s0301a:443_4: jarājiṇṇakāle tāni dhārento “ayaṃ ajjāpi bālabhāvaṃ pattheti,
atk-s0301a:443_8: Bālakālepi hi sīlaṃ rakkhantaṃ “kiṃ imassa sīlenā”ti?
atk-s0301a:444_0: Saddhā sādhu patiṭṭhitāti hatthāḷavakacittagahapatiādīnaṃ viya maggena āgatā patiṭṭhitasaddhā nāma sādhu.
atk-s0301a:444_1: Paññā narānaṃ ratananti ettha cittīkataṭṭhādīhi ratanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:445_9: Na hi sakkā tuletuṃ guṇehi guṇapāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:445_13: nanu bhagavā anomo sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanenā”ti.
atk-s0301a:446_2: sā hi arūpattā pariharituṃ na sakkāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:450_3: Mittanti roge uppanne pāṭaṅkiyā vā aññena vā yānena haritvā khemantasampāpanena mittaṃ.
atk-s0301a:450_6: mātā pana asucimpi candanaṃ viya maññati.
atk-s0301a:450_8: Sahāyo atthajātassāti uppannakiccassa yo taṃ kiccaṃ vahati nittharati,
atk-s0301a:450_9: so kiccesu saha ayanabhāvena sahāyo mittaṃ,
atk-s0301a:452_1: Catutthe puttā vatthūti mahallakakāle paṭijagganaṭṭhena puttā patiṭṭhā.

atk-s0301a:555_6: “sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba”nti disvā balavatarena sokena ruppi. So –
atk-s0301a:555_7: “imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā niddhamituṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā niccaṃ utrastanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:556_2: Niccanti ca padassa devaloke nibbattakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho na gahetabbo,
atk-s0301a:556_4: Anuppannesu kicchesūti ito sattāhaccayena yāni dukkhāni uppajjissanti, tesu.
atk-s0301a:556_5: Atho uppatitesu cāti yāni pañcasatānaṃ accharānaṃ niraye nibbattānaṃ diṭṭhāni,
atk-s0301a:556_6: tesu cāti evaṃ imesu uppannānuppannesu dukkhesu niccaṃ mama utrastaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0301a:556_7: abbhantare ḍayhamāno viya homi bhagavāti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:557_0: Nāññatra bojjhā tapasāti bojjhaṅgabhāvanañca tapoguṇañca aññatra muñcitvā sotthiṃ na passāmīti attho.
atk-s0301a:557_5: Indiyasaṃvare hi gahite catupārisuddhisīlaṃ gahitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:557_6: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhito bhikkhu nissayamuttako dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tapoguṇaṃ samādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:557_8: Tassa ariyamaggo yaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati,
atk-s0301a:559_1: Aṭṭhame kakudho devaputtoti ayaṃ kira kolanagare mahāmoggallānattherassa upaṭṭhākaputto daharakāleyeva
atk-s0301a:559_2: therassa santike vasanto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā kālaṅkato,
atk-s0301a:559_6: Kiṃ laddhāti tuṭṭhi nāma kiñci manāpaṃ labhitvā hoti,
atk-s0301a:559_8: Kiṃ jīyitthāti yassa hi kiñci manāpaṃ cīvarādivatthu jiṇṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:559_15: Aghanti evarūpassa hi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0301a:559_18: sukhavipariṇāmena dukkhaṃ āgatamevāti nandījātassa aghaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:561_0: 101. Dasame ānandattherassa anumānabuddhiyā ānubhāvappakāsanatthaṃ aññataroti āha. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:568_7: so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti.
atk-s0301a:568_11: Yo pana attanā yena tena yāpeti,
atk-s0301a:568_13: so pati jeṭṭhako sāmi hutvā deti.
atk-s0301a:569_0: Catūsu dvāresuti tassa kira rañño sindhavaraṭṭhaṃ sodhivākaraṭṭhanti dve raṭṭhāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:569_2: Tassa ekekasmiṃ dvāre devasikaṃ satasahassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0301a:569_4: So bahuhiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ rāsibhūtaṃ disvā kammassakatañāṇaṃ uppādetvā catūsu dvāresu dānasālāyo kāretvā
atk-s0301a:569_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uṭṭhitaāyena dānaṃ dethāti amacce ṭhapesi. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a:570_5: Vanibbakāti ye “iṭṭhaṃ, dinnaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, kālena,
atk-s0301a:570_8: gacchatu bhavaṃ brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0301a:570_10: sarāvamattaṃ dethā”tiādīni ca vatvā yācamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0301a:570_11: Itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyitthāti paṭhamadvārassa laddhattā tattha uppajjanakasatasahasse aññampi dhanaṃ
atk-s0301a:570_12: pakkhipitvā rañño amacce hāretvā attano amacce ṭhapetvā raññā dinnadānato rājitthiyo mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:570_14: Mama dānaṃ paṭikkamīti yaṃ mama dānaṃ tattha dīyittha,
atk-s0301a:570_19: Ettakaṃ kira kālaṃ tassa rañño dānaṃ dīyittha. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:573_1: Pañcame kosalesu viharantīti bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha gantvā viharanti.
atk-s0301a:573_2: Uddhatāti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya ca kappiye akappiyasaññitāya ca anavajje sāvajjasaññitāya ca sāvajje anavajjasaññitāya ca uddhaccapakatikā hutvā.
atk-s0301a:574_6: “ime bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0301a:574_8: na kho panete pāṭiyekkaṃ nisinnaṭṭhāne codiyamānā kathaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0301a:574_9: samāgamanakāle codissāmī”ti uposathadivase tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:574_10: Gāthāhi ajjhabhāsīti sabbesaṃ majjhe ṭhatvā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:575_0: Tattha yasmā guṇakathāya saddhiṃ nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0301a:575_1: tasmā guṇaṃ tāva kathento sukhajīvino pure āsuntiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:575_2: Tattha sukhajīvino pure āsunti pubbe bhikkhū supposā subharā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:575_3: uccanīcakulesu sapadānaṃ caritvā laddhena missakapiṇḍena yāpesunti adhippāyena evamāha.
atk-s0301a:576_0: Evaṃ porāṇakabhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathento dupposantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:576_1: Tattha gāme gāmaṇikā viyāti yathā gāme gāmakuṭā nānappakārena janaṃ pīḷetvā khīradadhitaṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0301a:576_2: evaṃ tumhepi anesanāya ṭhitā tumhākaṃ jīvikaṃ kappethāti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0301a:576_3: Nipajjantīti uddesaparipucchāmanasikārehi anatthikā hutvā sayanamhi hatthapāde vissajjetvā nipajjanti.
atk-s0301a:577_4: Yathā hi susāne chaḍḍitā nānāsakuṇādīhi khajjanti,
atk-s0301a:577_8: evamevaṃ evarūpāpi ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ santikā ovādānusāsaniṃ na labhantīti apaviddhā anāthā,
atk-s0301a:579_2: Na cavati na upapajjatīti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:579_4: Nāhaṃ taṃ lokassa antanti satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0301a:580_2: So pana attano pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametīti saññāya pasaṃsanto acchariyantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:581_3: Susikkhitoti dasa dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito.
atk-s0301a:581_4: Katahatthoti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho.
atk-s0301a:581_9: tāvatā kālena ekacakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a:582_0: Puratthimā samuddā pacchimoti yathā puratthimasamuddā pacchimasamuddo dūre,
atk-s0301a:582_1: evaṃ me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:582_2: So kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0301a:582_3: puna dutiyaṃ pādaṃ pasāretvā paracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati.
atk-s0301a:582_6: Bhikkhācārakāle kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi
atk-s0301a:582_7: piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a:582_10: ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a:582_12: Antarāva kālaṅkatoti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato.
atk-s0301a:582_13: So pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi āgantvā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:582_24: imasmiṃ pana cātumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃ yeva paññapemī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:585_2: sāriputto ruccatīti satthā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo,
atk-s0301a:585_3: vaṇṇo ca nāmesa visabhāgapuggalassa santike kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a:585_4: Tassa santike kathito hi matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0301a:585_5: So hi “asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā”ti vutte.
atk-s0301a:585_8: Kiṃ tayā añño sīlavā na diṭṭhapubbo”ti vā?
atk-s0301a:585_11: Kiṃ tayā añño paññavā na diṭṭhapubbo”ti? Vā,
atk-s0301a:585_15: attano upaṭṭhākadārake pabbājetvā therassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpeti,
atk-s0301a:585_21: “amhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ satasahassañca kappe pāramiyo pūretvā soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0301a:585_22: dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhito”ti therassa guṇesu pasīditvāva theraṃ mamāyati.
atk-s0301a:585_24: “sammāsambuddhassa mayā kattabbaṃ mukhodakadānādikiccaṃ sabbaṃ ānando karoti.
atk-s0301a:585_25: Ānandaṃ nissāya ahaṃ icchiticchitaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ labhāmī”ti āyasmato ānandassa guṇesu pasīditvāva taṃ mamāyati.
atk-s0301a:585_26: Tasmā bhagavā sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo ānandattherassa santike kathetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0301a:586_2: sāriputtassa ācāro gocaro vihāro abhikkamo paṭikkamo ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjitapasāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0301a:587_0: Tato thero sāṭakantare laddhokāso balavamallo viya tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā –
atk-s0301a:587_3: dīpadhajabhūtaṃ mahājambuṃ vidhunanto viya valāhakantarato candaṃ nīharitvā dassento viya sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0301a:587_4: vaṇṇaṃ kathetu”nti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃ tāva catūhi padehi puggalapalāpe haranto kassa hi nāma, bhante,
atk-s0301a:587_9: vipallatthacitto ummattako cittavipallāsena vaṇṇaṃ “vaṇṇo”ti vā avaṇṇaṃ “avaṇṇe”ti vā,
atk-s0301a:587_14: Na rucceyyāti bālādīnaṃyeva hi so na rucceyya,
atk-s0301a:588_0: Evaṃ puggalapalāpe haritvā idāni soḷasahi padehi yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento paṇḍito,
atk-s0301a:588_6: bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti āyatanakusalo ca paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca,
atk-s0301a:589_0: Sā pana therassa devorohanaṃ katvā saṅkassanagaradvāre ṭhitena satthārā puthujjanapañcake pañhe pucchite taṃ vissajjentassa pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0301a:590_23: puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0301a:591_1: Idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0301a:591_22: hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.
atk-s0301a:592_0: Thero ca sarado nāma tāpaso hutvā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle aggasāvakapatthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a:592_1: Taṃkālato paṭṭhāya hāsabahulo sīlaparipūraṇādīni akāsīti hāsapañño.
atk-s0301a:593_3: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a:593_17: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ…
atk-s0301a:593_20: vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a:593_23: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti
atk-s0301a:593_24: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a:594_6: uppannaṃ rāgaṃ… dosaṃ… mohaṃ… kodhaṃ… upanāhaṃ… makkhaṃ… paḷāsaṃ… issaṃ…
atk-s0301a:594_19: cha ca abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā phassitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0301a:595_0: Thero ca bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasutte desiyamāne ṭhitakova sabbakilese
atk-s0301a:595_1: chinditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paṭividdhakālato paṭṭhāya tikkhapañño nāma jāto. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a:596_1: Idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0301a:596_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.
atk-s0301a:597_3: Santuṭṭhoti catūsu paccayesu yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti,
atk-s0301a:597_9: Asaṃsaṭṭhoti dassanasaṃsaggo savanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo paribhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti,
atk-s0301a:597_11: Ayañca pañcavidho saṃsaggo rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi upāsakehi upasikāhi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0301a:598_1: Tattha āraddhavīriyo bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a:598_3: nisajjāya uppannassa seyyaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a:598_4: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ tattha tattheva niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a:598_5: Thero pana catucattālīsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāreti.
atk-s0301a:598_10: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ovadati anusāsatīti attho.
atk-s0301a:599_8: Thero kiñci avatvāva ekamantaṃ gantvā parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā āgamma “ettakaṃ vaṭṭati ācariyā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:603_0: Codakoti vatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā vītikkamaṃ disvā – “āvuso,
atk-s0301a:604_0: Pāpagarahīti pāpapuggale na passe, na tesaṃ vacanaṃ suṇe, tehi saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷepi na vaseyyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:607_2: uppanno rāgo doso moho pahātabbo”ti evaṃ pāpadhammepi garahatīti dvīhi kāraṇehi “pāpagarahī, bhante,
atk-s0301a:608_0: Evaṃ āyasmatā ānandena soḷasahi padehi therassa yathābhūtavaṇṇappakāsane kate –
atk-s0301a:608_1: “kiṃ ānando attano piyasahāyassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0301a:608_2: kathetu kiṃ pana tena kathitaṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0301a:608_4: Koci pāpapuggalo vattuṃ mā labhatūti satthā taṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ akuppaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto jinamuddikāya lañchanto evametantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:609_0: Evaṃ tathāgatena ca ānandattherena ca mahātherassa vaṇṇe kathiyamāne bhumaṭṭhakā devatā uṭṭhahitvā eteheva soḷasahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:609_1: Tato ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā cātumahārājikāti yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā devatā uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0301a:609_3: Etenupāyena ekacakkavāḷaṃ ādiṃ katvā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā uṭṭhahitvā kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:609_4: Athāyasmato sāriputtassa saddhivihāriko susīmo devaputto cintesi –
atk-s0301a:609_5: “imā devatā attano attano nakkhattakīḷaṃ pahāya tattha tattha gantvā mayhaṃ upajjhāyasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0301a:609_9: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho susīmotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:610_0: Uccāvacāti aññesu ṭhānesu paṇītaṃ uccaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0301a:610_8: Teneva seyyathāpi nāmāti catasso upamā āgatā.
atk-s0301a:610_13: Evamevanti rattakambale nikkhittamaṇi viya sabbā ekappahāreneva virocituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0301a:610_17: mahājambuphalarase vā pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhe suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0301a:611_9: sāriputtamoggallāne”tiādinā nayena therassa vaṇṇaṃ āharīti thero ābhatavaṇṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a:611_13: divasasaṅkhepaṃ vetanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitapuriso viya kālaṃ pana pattheti,
atk-s0301a:613_0: Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā”ti. ; Navamaṃ;
atk-s0301a:615_1: Dasame nānātitthiyasāvakāti te kira kammavādino ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:615_2: tasmā dānādīni puññāni katvā sagge nibbattā,
atk-s0301a:615_3: te “attano attano satthari pasādena nibbattamhā”ti saññino hutvā “gacchāma dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā
atk-s0301a:615_4: amhākaṃ satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmā”ti āgantvā paccekagāthāhi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:615_5: Tattha chinditamāriteti chindite ca mārite ca.
atk-s0301a:615_7: Puññaṃ vā panāti attano puññampi na samanupassati,
atk-s0301a:615_10: “evaṃ katapāpānampi katapuññānampi vipāko natthī”ti vadanto sattānaṃ vissāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0301a:615_11: tasmā mānanaṃ vandanaṃ pūjanaṃ arahatīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:616_5: Cātuyāmo nāma sabbavārivārito ca hoti sabbavāriyutto ca sabbavāridhuto ca sabbavāriphuṭo cāti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā.
atk-s0301a:616_13: Diṭṭhaṃ sutañca ācikkhanti diṭṭhaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sutaṃ “sutaṃ me”ti ācikkhanto,
atk-s0301a:616_15: Na hi nūna kibbisīti evarūpo satthā kibbisakārako nāma na hoti.
atk-s0301a:617_6: Na hi nūna teti sappurisehi na dūre,
atk-s0301a:617_8: Paccabhāsīti “ayaṃ ākoṭako imesaṃ nagganissirikānaṃ dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā vaṇṇaṃ kathetīti tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti patiabhāsīti.
atk-s0301a:618_4: Na sataṃ sarikkhoti paṇḍitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sadiso na hoti,
atk-s0301a:618_5: kiṃ tvaṃ kālasigālasadise titthiye sīhe karosīti?
atk-s0301a:619_1: teneva naṃ mukhena vaṇṇaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti cintetvā tassa sarīre anuāvisi adhimucci,
atk-s0301a:619_5: Te kira “nhāpitapavivekaṃ pālessāmā”ti sayaṃ kese luñcanti.
atk-s0301a:619_7: “Piṇḍapātapavivekaṃ pālessāmā”ti sunakhā viya bhūmiyaṃ vā bhuñjanti hatthesu vā.
atk-s0301a:619_12: te ve maccā paralokatthāya sammā anusāsantīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:620_0: Iti viditvāti “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ etesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni vaṇṇaṃ katheti,
atk-s0301a:620_1: ko nu kho eso”ti āvajjento jānitvāva.
atk-s0301a:620_2: Ye cantalikkhasmiṃ pabhāsavaṇṇāti ye antalikkhe candobhāsasūriyobhāsasañjhārāgaindadhanutārakarūpānaṃ pabhāsavaṇṇā.
atk-s0301a:620_3: Sabbeva te teti sabbeva te tayā.
atk-s0301a:620_5: Āmisaṃva macchānaṃ vadhāya khittāti yathā macchānaṃ vadhatthāya baḷisalaggaṃ āmisaṃ khipati,
atk-s0301a:620_6: evaṃ tayā pasaṃsamānena ete rūpā sattānaṃ vadhāya khittāti vadati.
atk-s0301a:621_11: evaṃ sadevakassa lokassa buddho seṭṭhoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:631_1: Kosalasaṃyuttassa paṭhame bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0301a:631_2: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi.
atk-s0301a:631_3: Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi. Yāya ca – “kacci,
atk-s0301a:631_7: kacci bhoto ca gotamassa sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0301a:631_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:631_9: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya cirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:631_13: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā
atk-s0301a:631_14: niṭṭhapetvā ito pubbe tathāgatassa adiṭṭhattā guṇāguṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ vā uttānabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto
atk-s0301a:631_16: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho yaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgato lokanissaraṇabhavokkantipañhaṃ satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchituṃ bhavampi notiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:632_5: Idaṃ pana rājā na attano laddhiyā,
atk-s0301a:632_7: Atha bhagavā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadanto yaṃ hi taṃ mahārājātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:632_8: Tattha ahaṃ hi mahārājāti anuttaraṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ahaṃ abhisambuddhoti attho.
atk-s0301a:632_11: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0301a:632_15: “Appicchā santuṭṭhā appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”ti evaṃ samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0301a:632_22: So pana gosālāya jātattā gosāloti vutto.
atk-s0301a:633_0: Tepi mayāti kappakolāhalaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ cakkavattikolāhalanti tīṇi kolāhalāni.
atk-s0301a:633_1: Tattha “vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a:633_4: karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkha”nti manussappathe devatā ghosentiyo vicaranti.
atk-s0301a:633_5: “Vassasahassamatthake pana buddho uppajjissatī”ti buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a:633_6: “ito vassasahassamatthake buddho uppajjitvā dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena saṅgharatanena parivārito
atk-s0301a:633_8: “Vassasatamatthake pana cakkavattī uppajjissatī”ti cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a:633_9: “ito vassasatamatthake sattaratanasampanno catuddīpissaro sahassa puttaparivāro vehāsaṅgamo cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī”ti devatā ugghosenti.
atk-s0301a:634_0: Imesu tīsu kolāhalesu ime cha satthāro buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā ācariye payirupāsitvā cintāmāṇivijjādīni uggaṇhitvā –
atk-s0301a:634_1: “mayaṃ buddhamhā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā mahājanaparivutā janapadaṃ vicarantā anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ pattā.
atk-s0301a:634_5: ajito kesakambalo buddho kira sabbaññū kirā”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:634_9: Rañño gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttā gantuṃ na ussahanti,
atk-s0301a:634_10: punappunaṃ vuccamānā upaṭṭhākānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthāya adhivāsetvā sabbe ekatova agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:634_13: te mahārahesu āsanesu nisīdituṃ asakkontā phalakesu ceva bhūmiyaṃ ca nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:635_0: Rājā “ettakeneva natthi tesaṃ anto sukkadhammo”ti vatvā āhāraṃ adatvāva tālato patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya “tumhe buddhā,
atk-s0301a:635_4: rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā kathetuṃ asakkonte ‘tumhe mayaṃ buddhāti mahājanaṃ vañcetvā āhiṇḍathā’ti jivhampi chindāpeyya,
atk-s0301a:635_5: aññampi anatthaṃ kareyyā”ti sakapaṭiññāya eva ‘na mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:635_8: “kiṃ ācariyā rājā tumhe pañhaṃ pucchitvā sakkārasammānaṃ akāsī”ti?
atk-s0301a:635_11: “sace ayaṃ rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathiyamānaṃ ajānanto amhesu manaṃ padosessati,
atk-s0301a:635_12: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti rañño anukampāya ‘na mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadimhā,
atk-s0301a:635_19: Tattha kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā,
atk-s0301a:635_20: navo ca pabbajjāyāti idaṃ attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vadati.
atk-s0301a:635_22: Ete jātimahallakā ca cirapabbajitā ca “buddhamhā”ti na paṭijānanti,
atk-s0301a:635_23: bhavaṃ gotamo jātiyā ca daharo pabbajjāya ca navo kiṃ paṭijānāti?
atk-s0301a:636_6: Bhikkhūti imasmiṃ pana pade desanākusalatāya attānaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā sīlavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a:636_12: heṭṭhā katvā maññanavasena aññampi evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karonto khattiyaṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_15: kiṃ nāma yaṃkiñci corūpaddavaṃ vūpasametuṃ yattha katthaci ṭhāne rajjaṃ anusāsituṃ sakkhissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_16: Añjanisalākamattampi āsīvisapotakaṃ kaṇṇādīsu piḷandhanto aṅgulimpi jivhampi ḍaṃsāpento uragaṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_17: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ āsīviso udakadeḍḍubho viya kiṃ nāma kiñcideva ḍaṃsituṃ kassacideva kāye visaṃ pharituṃ sakkhissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_18: Khajjopanakamattampi aggiṃ gahetvā hatthena kīḷanto bhaṇḍukkhalikāya khipanto cūḷāya vā sayanapiṭṭhasāṭakapasibbakādīsu
atk-s0301a:636_20: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ aggi kataraṃ nu kho yāgubhattaṃ pacissati,
atk-s0301a:636_22: kassa sītaṃ vinodessatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_23: Daharasāmaṇerampi pana disvā ukkamitvā maggaṃ adentoti rājakumāre vuttaṃ anācāraṃ karonto bhikkhuṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_24: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero mahākaṇṭho mahodaro yaṃkiñci buddhavacanaṃ uggahetuṃ yaṃkiñci araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasituṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0301a:636_25: saṅghattherakāle manāpo bhavissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a:636_26: Taṃ sabbampi na kātabbanti dassento na uññātabbo na paribhotabboti āha.
atk-s0301a:637_1: Gāthā ca nāmetā tadatthadīpanāpi honti visesatthadīpanāpi,
atk-s0301a:638_5: Tasmiṃ pakkamate bhusanti tasmiṃ puggale balavaupakkamaṃ upakkamati.
atk-s0301a:638_6: Rakkhaṃ jīvitamattanoti attano jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyya na ghaṭṭeyya.
atk-s0301a:639_2: Yena yena hi vaṇṇena caranto gocaraṃ labhati,
atk-s0301a:639_9: taṃ bālaṃ naraṃ vā nāriṃ vā ḍaṃseyya.
atk-s0301a:641_2: Jāyanti tattha pārohāti tattha agginā daḍḍhavane pārohā jāyanti.
atk-s0301a:641_4: Te hi agginā daḍḍhaṭṭhāne mūlamattepi avasiṭṭhe pādato rohanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0301a:642_0: Bhikkhu ḍahati tejasāti ettha akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto
atk-s0301a:642_1: bhikkhu nāma kiñci bhikkhutejasā ḍahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:642_7: Na tassa puttā pasavoti tassa puttadhītaropi gomahiṃsakukkuṭasūkarādayo pasavopi na bhavanti,
atk-s0301a:642_9: Dāyādā vindare dhananti tassa dāyādāpi dhanaṃ na vindanti.
atk-s0301a:642_10: Tālāvatthū bhavanti teti te bhikkhutejasā daḍḍhā vatthumattāvasiṭṭho matthakacchinnatālo viya bhavanti,
atk-s0301a:643_0: Tasmāti yasmā samaṇatejena daḍḍhā matthakacchinnatālo viya aviruḷhidhammā bhavanti, tasmā.
atk-s0301a:643_4: uragaṃ nissāya tassa kīḷāpanena laddhabbaṃ vatthahiraññasuvaṇṇādiānisaṃsaṃ aggiṃ nissāya tassānubhāvena
atk-s0301a:643_6: bhikkhuṃ nissāya tassa vasena pattabbaṃ asutasavanasutapariyodapana-
atk-s0301a:643_7: saggamaggādhigamādiānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānena “ete nissāya pubbe vuttappakāro ādīnavo atthi.
atk-s0301a:643_10: Issariyatthikena pana vuttappakāraṃ avajānanañca paribhavanañca akatvā pubbuṭṭhāyipacchānipātitādīhi upāyehi khattiyakumāro tosetabbo,
atk-s0301a:643_12: Ahituṇḍikena urage vissāsaṃ akatvā nāgavijjaṃ parivattetvā ajapadena daṇḍena gīvāya gahetvā visaharena
atk-s0301a:643_13: mūlena dāṭhā dhovitvā peḷāyaṃ pakkhipitvā kīḷāpentena caritabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:643_15: Yāgupacanādīni kattukāmena aggiṃ vissāsena bhaṇḍukkhalikādīsu apakkhipitvā hatthehi anāmasantena gomayacuṇṇādīhi jāletvā yāgupacanādīni kattabbāni,
atk-s0301a:643_17: Asutasavanādīni patthayantenapi bhikkhuṃ ativissāsena vejjakammanavakammādīsu ayojetvā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo,
atk-s0301a:643_18: evaṃ taṃ nissāya asutapubbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ asutapubbaṃ pañhāvinicchayaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0301a:643_19: tisso kulasampattiyo cha kāmasaggāni nava ca brahmaloke patvā amatamahānibbānadassanampi labhissatīti
atk-s0301a:644_0: Etadavocāti dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno pasādaṃ āvikaronto etaṃ “abhikkanta”ntiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a:644_3: Ettha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi “abhikkantaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:644_6: yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādo”ti.
atk-s0301a:645_0: Tato paraṃ catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0301a:645_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0301a:645_8: Andhakāreti kāḷapakkhacātuddasī aḍḍharattaghanavanasaṇḍa meghapaṭalehi caturaṅge tame.
atk-s0301a:645_11: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0301a:645_13: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0301a:645_17: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotaṃ
atk-s0301a:645_18: dhārentena mayhaṃ bhagavatā etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0301a:646_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:646_2: Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti bhagavantañca dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti imaṃ ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
atk-s0301a:646_4: bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā ‘upāsako aya’nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0301a:646_10: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0301a:646_11: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0301a:646_12: vitthāro pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sāmaññaphalasutte sabbākārena vuttoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:648_1: Dutiye abhivādetvāti purimasutte saraṇagatattā idha abhivādesi.
atk-s0301a:648_9: Tacasāraṃva samphalanti yathā tacasāraṃ veḷuṃ vā naḷaṃ vā attano phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti,
atk-s0301a:650_1: Tatiye aññatra jarāmaraṇāti jarāmaraṇato mutto nāma atthīti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:650_3: Yesaṃ hi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:650_4: tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti,
atk-s0301a:650_7: diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-s0301a:650_10: kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-s0301a:651_7: Tesampi jātānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇāti tesampi evaṃ issarānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇā,
atk-s0301a:652_3: Catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ etesaṃ katanti katakaraṇīyā.
atk-s0301a:652_6: Anuppatto arahattasaṅkhāto sako attho etesanti anuppattasadatthā.
atk-s0301a:652_9: Maggapaññāya catusaccadhammaṃ ñatvā phalavimuttiyā vimuttāti attho.
atk-s0301a:652_18: Tattha bhagavā citrāni rathayānādīni disvā diṭṭhameva upamaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a:653_3: Atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upetīti evarūpesu anupādiṇṇakesu sāradārumayesu rathesu jīrantesu imasmiṃ ajjhattike
atk-s0301a:653_6: Santo have sabbhi pavedayantīti santo sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetīti evaṃ pavedayanti.
atk-s0301a:653_10: Yasmā vā nibbānaṃ āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti,
atk-s0301a:653_12: Iti purimapadassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:653_16: Ajaraṃ nibbānaṃ sataṃ dhammoti ācikkhantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:653_18: Yaṃ sabbhidhammabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ santo pavedayanti kathayanti,
atk-s0301a:653_19: so sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetītipi attho. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:655_3: mahārājāti idha bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto āha.
atk-s0301a:657_4: Sādhu sabbattha saṃvaroti iminā kammapathabhedaṃ apattassa kammassa saṃvaraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a:657_6: Lajjīgahaṇena cettha ottappampi gahitameva hoti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:659_1: Chaṭṭhe uḷāre uḷāreti paṇīte ca bahuke ca.
atk-s0301a:661_7: Tattha paṭhamataraṃ lañjaṃ gahetvā nisinnā amaccā assāmikepi sāmike kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a:661_11: Paññāyissati dāni viṭaṭūbho senāpati sakena rajjena,
atk-s0301a:661_12: kiṃ mayhaṃ evarūpehi lañjakhādakehi musāvādīhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne nisajjāyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0301a:661_15: Yathā macchā oḍḍitaṃ kuminaṃ pavisantā na jānanti,
atk-s0301a:661_16: evaṃ sattā kilesakāmena vatthukāmaṃ vītikkamantā na jānantīti attho. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:663_1: Aṭṭhame atthi nu kho te malliketi kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0301a:663_3: ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā “mālārāmaṃ gantvāva khādissāmī”ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivāraṃ
atk-s0301a:663_4: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0301a:663_7: Bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0301a:663_12: Taṃdivasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena yuddhena parājito palāyitvā nagaraṃ āgacchanto mālārāmaṃ pavisitvā balakāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamesi.
atk-s0301a:663_14: So tāya vatte pasīditvā taṃ antepūraṃ atihārāpetvā taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a:664_1: “mayā imissā duggatakulassa dhītuyā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a:664_6: Iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento pucchati.
atk-s0301a:664_7: Sā pana devī paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā dhammupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā mahāpaññā,
atk-s0301a:664_11: Rājā tāya sarasena kathitattā nivattituṃ alabhanto sayampi saraseneva kathetvā “sakāraṇaṃ idaṃ,
atk-s0301a:664_12: tathāgatassa naṃ ārocessāmī”ti gantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0301a:664_14: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti yathā ekassa attā piyo,
atk-s0301a:664_15: evaṃ paresaṃ puthusattānampi attā piyoti attho. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:666_3: Parikammāni karontīti ettāvatā tehi bhikkhūhi rañño āraddhayañño tathāgatassa ārocito.
atk-s0301a:666_4: Kasmā pana raññā ayaṃ yañño āraddho?
atk-s0301a:666_6: Ekadivasaṃ kira rājā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ anusañcaranto vātapānaṃ
atk-s0301a:666_7: vivaritvā olokayamānaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā tassā paṭibaddhacitto tatova paṭinivattitvā antepuraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0301a:666_8: ekassa purisassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “gaccha tassā sassāmikabhāvaṃ vā assāmikabhāvaṃ vā jānāhī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0301a:666_10: Sā “eso me sāmiko āpaṇe nisinno”ti dassesi.
atk-s0301a:666_12: Rājā taṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā “maṃ upaṭṭhahā”ti āha. “Nāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0301a:666_13: upaṭṭhahituṃ jānāmī”ti ca vutte “upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na ācariyassa santike uggahetabba”nti balakkārena āvudhaphalakaṃ gāhāpetvā upaṭṭhākaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a:666_14: Upaṭṭhahitvā gehaṃ gatamattameva ca naṃ puna pakkosāpetvā “upaṭṭhākena nāma rañño vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a:666_15: gaccha ito yojanamatte amhākaṃ sīsadhovanapokkharaṇī atthi,
atk-s0301a:667_1: “ajja sāyanheyeva dvāraṃ pidahitvā ‘ahaṃ rājadūto’ti vā ‘uparājadūto’ti vā bhaṇantānampi mā vivarī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:667_2: So puriso mattikañca uppalāni ca gahetvā dvāre pihitamatte āgantvā bahuṃ vadantopi dvāraṃ alabhitvā parissayabhayena jetavanaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:667_6: sanniṭṭhānaṃ alabhanto yattha katthaci nisinnakova makkaṭaniddāya niddāyati.
atk-s0301a:668_0: Pubbe ca tasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikakammaṃ katvā nandopanandāya nāma lohakumbhiyā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:668_1: Te pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamānā tiṃsavassasahassāni heṭṭhā gacchantā kumbhiyā talaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0301a:668_3: Te taṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā attano dukkaṭabhayena ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharameva āhaṃsu. Eko sa- kāraṃ, eko so- kāraṃ, eko na- kāraṃ, eko du-
atk-s0301a:668_5: Rājā tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ saddaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya sukhaṃ avindamānova taṃrattāvasesaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0301a:669_0: Aruṇe uṭṭhite purohito āgantvā taṃ sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0301a:669_5: “imassa rañño iminā supinena vuḍḍhi vā hāni vā natthi,
atk-s0301a:669_6: apica kho pana yaṃ imassa gehe atthi,
atk-s0301a:669_18: Gacchatha ācariyehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhākaṃ sotthiṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0301a:670_0: So sivikasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇe sannipātetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0301a:670_1: “visuṃ visuṃ gantvā evaṃ vadathā”ti tayo vagge akāsi.
atk-s0301a:670_3: Rājā purohitassa kathitaniyāmeneva kathetvā “kathaṃ sotthi bhaveyyā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0301a:670_5: “sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā etassa kammassa sotthi bhaveyya, evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:670_7: Rājā tesaṃ sutvā anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0301a:670_11: Tato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇā usabhādayo pāṇe āharāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:670_13: Taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā mallikā rājānaṃ tathāgatassa santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0301a:670_14: So gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:670_17: āgacchasi divādivassā”ti āha. Rājā – “ajja me, bhante,
atk-s0301a:670_21: sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā paṭikammaṃ karomāti āraddhā”’ti āha. Kinti te, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:670_24: Atha naṃ bhagavā āha – pubbe, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:670_25: imasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikā hutvā nandopanandāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattā saṭṭhivassasahassamatthake uggacchiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:675_0: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0301a:678_0: “Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
atk-s0301a:679_0: Tadā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0301a:683_1: Te imā gāthā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā tattheva nimuggā. Iti, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:683_3: Tassa saddassa sutapaccayā tuyhaṃ hāni vā vuḍḍhi vā natthi.
atk-s0301a:683_4: Ettakānaṃ pana pasūnaṃ ghātanakammaṃ nāma bhāriyanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a:683_9: sīto ca nesaṃ vāto upavāyatū”ti vatvā,
atk-s0301a:683_11: Te gantvā brāhmaṇe palāpetvā taṃ pāṇasaṅghaṃ bandhanato mocetvā nagare dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:684_0: Atha rājā dasabalassa santike nisinno āha – “bhante,
atk-s0301a:684_2: mayhaṃ pana ajja dve rattiyo ekato ghaṭitā viya ahesu”nti.
atk-s0301a:684_5: mayhaṃ pana ajja dve yojanāni ekato katāni viya ahesu”nti.
atk-s0301a:684_9: vaṭṭapatitassa pana bālaputhujjanassa anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃ ekantadīghamevā”ti rājānañca tañca purisaṃ
atk-s0301a:684_10: nerayikasatte ca ārabbha dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0301a:687_0: Gāthāpariyosāne so itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0301a:688_1: porāṇarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ purisamedhaṃ sammāpāsaṃ vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:688_8: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vināva vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a:688_14: Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ.
atk-s0301a:688_15: Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti.
atk-s0301a:688_16: Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:689_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0301a:689_1: uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhanti ādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:689_3: Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ majjhimadivaseyeva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassa
atk-s0301a:689_4: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:689_6: Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:689_8: Divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato
atk-s0301a:689_9: pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:689_11: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:689_13: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0301a:689_20: taṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchinnattā manussā dadantīti attho. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:691_2: raññāti idaṃ te bhikkhū tesu manussesu ānandattherassa sukatakāraṇaṃ ārocentā ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:691_3: Rañño kira sakkena kusarājassa dinno aṭṭhavaṅko maṇi paveṇiyā āgato.
atk-s0301a:691_4: Rājā alaṅkaraṇakāle taṃ maṇiṃ āharathāti āha.
atk-s0301a:691_7: Ānandatthero te disvā maṇipaṭisāmakānaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0301a:691_11: Paṭisāmakamanussā rājaṅgaṇe udakacāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā te manusse āhaṃsu –
atk-s0301a:691_14: “rājabhaṇḍaṃ vissajjetuṃ vā valañjetuṃ vā na sakkā”ti.
atk-s0301a:691_15: So gehaṃ gantvā maṇiṃ upakacchake ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ pārupitvā āgamma udakacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a:691_16: Mahājane paṭikkante rājamanussā cāṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ otāretvā maṇiṃ disvā āharitvā rañño adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:691_17: “Ānandattherena kira dassitanayena maṇi diṭṭho”ti mahājano kolāhalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a:691_18: Te bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatassa ārocentā imaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā –
atk-s0301a:691_22: yattha pubbe paṇḍitā attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ tiracchānagatānampi hatthāruḷhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpetvā rañño adaṃsū”ti vatvā –
atk-s0301a:693_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”nti. –
atk-s0301a:695_0: Na taṃ daḷhanti taṃ bandhanaṃ thiranti na kathenti.
atk-s0301a:695_8: Sithilanti na āyasādibandhanaṃ viya iriyāpathaṃ nivāretvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:695_9: Tena hi bandhanena baddhā paradesampi gacchantiyeva.
atk-s0301a:695_10: Duppamuñcanti aññatra lokuttarañāṇena muñcituṃ asakkuṇeyyanti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:699_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame pubbārāme migāramātupāsādeti pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde.
atk-s0301a:699_3: atīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0301a:699_5: “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a:699_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaputtassa
atk-s0301a:699_7: dhanañcayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0301a:699_10: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ gatā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0301a:699_11: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā.
atk-s0301a:700_2: So kira pāsādo lohapāsādo viya samantā catudvārakoṭṭhakayuttena pākārena parikkhitto.
atk-s0301a:700_3: Tesu pācīnadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi pāsādacchāyāyaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento paññatte varabuddhāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0301a:701_3: Avidūre atikkamantīti avidūramaggena nagaraṃ pavisanti. Rājāhaṃ,
atk-s0301a:701_7: Kasmā pana rājā loke aggapuggalassa santike nisinno evarūpānaṃ naggabhogganissirikānaṃ añjaliṃ paggaṇhātīti.
atk-s0301a:701_12: ayaṃ amhākaṃ añjalimattampi na karotī’ti attanā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:703_1: Sīlaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ susīlo vā dussīlo vāti saṃvasantena upasaṅkamantena jānitabbo.
atk-s0301a:703_2: Tañca kho dīghena addhunā na ittaranti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a:703_4: Dvīhatīhañhi saṃyatākāro ca saṃvutindriyākāro ca na sakkā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0301a:703_5: Manasikarotāti sīlamassa pariggahessāmīti manasikarontena paccavekkhanteneva sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0301a:703_8: Bālo hi manasikarontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:706_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0301a:707_5: Ekaccassa hi sammukhā kathā parammukhāya kathāya na sameti,
atk-s0301a:707_9: So kathenteneva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti.
atk-s0301a:707_14: tasmā kathentena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento evamāha.
atk-s0301a:708_2: so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ katabbakiccaṃ apassanto advāragharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati.
atk-s0301a:708_6: Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uppalavati,
atk-s0301a:708_8: Udakavipphanditeneva hi maccho khuddako vā mahanto vāti ñāyati.
atk-s0301a:710_2: Kāmānaṃ agganti etaṃ kāmānaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhanti rūpagaruko āha.
atk-s0301a:710_7: Puggalamanāpaṃ nāma yaṃ ekassa puggalassa iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:710_9: Paccantavāsīnañhi gaṇḍuppādāpi iṭṭhā honti kantā manāpā,
atk-s0301a:711_2: Vibhajantena ca na atiissarānaṃ mahāsammatamahāsudassanadhammāsokādīnaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:711_5: Tesañhi kaṇājakabhattasitthānipi pūtimaṃsassa rasopi atimadhuro amatasadiso hoti.
atk-s0301a:711_6: Majjhimānaṃ pana gaṇakamahāmattaseṭṭhi kuṭumbikavāṇijādīnaṃ kālena iṭṭhaṃ kālena aniṭṭhaṃ labhamānānaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:711_7: Tañca panetaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paricchindituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:711_11: Kiñcāpi hi micchādiṭṭhikā buddhaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā mahācetiyādīni vā uḷārāni ārammaṇāni disvā akkhīni pidahanti domanassaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0301a:711_14: Kiñcāpi gūthasūkarādayo gūthagandhaṃ ghāyitvā khādituṃ labhissāmāti somanassajātā honti,
atk-s0301a:711_18: Bhagavā pana puggalamanāpataṃ sandhāya te ca, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:712_1: Paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavāti bhagavā mayhaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.
atk-s0301a:712_2: Tassa te pañca rājāno āmuttamaṇikuṇḍale sajjitāya āpānabhūmiyā nisinnavaseneva mahatā rājānubhāvena paramena
atk-s0301a:712_3: issariyavibhavena āgantvāpi dasabalassa santike ṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya divā padīpe viya udakābhisitte aṅgāre
atk-s0301a:712_4: viya sūriyuṭṭhāne khajjopanake viya ca hatappabhe hatasobhe taṃ tathāgatañca tehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0301a:712_6: “mahantā vata bho buddhā nāmā”ti paṭibhānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0301a:713_7: Yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pātova phullaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā,
atk-s0301a:713_8: evameva bhagavantaṃ aṅgīrasaṃ tapantaṃ ādiccamiva antalikkhe virocamānaṃ passāti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0301a:713_12: “ete tathāgatassa guṇesu pasīditvā mayhaṃ pañca uttarāsaṅge denti,
atk-s0301a:713_13: ahampi te bhagavatova dassāmī”ti cintetvā adāsi. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:715_2: doṇassa taṇḍulānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ tadūpiyañca sūpabyañjanaṃ bhuñjatīti attho.
atk-s0301a:715_3: Bhuttāvīti pubbe bhattasammadaṃ vinodetvā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:715_4: taṃdivasaṃ pana bhuñjantova dasabalaṃ saritvā hatthe dhovitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:715_5: Mahassāsīti tassa gacchato balavā bhattaparīḷāho udapādi,
atk-s0301a:715_8: tamenaṃ ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā yamakatālavaṇṭehi bījanti,
atk-s0301a:715_9: buddhagāravena pana nipajjituṃ na ussahatīti idaṃ sandhāya “mahassāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:715_12: phāsu vihāraṃ dānissa karissāmīti cintetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:715_14: Kahāpaṇasatanti pātarāse paṇṇāsaṃ sāyamāse paṇṇāsanti evaṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ.
atk-s0301a:715_15: Pariyāpuṇitvāti raññā saddhiṃ thokaṃ gantvā “imaṃ maṅgalaasiṃ kassa dammi,
atk-s0301a:715_17: Asukassa nāma dehīti so taṃ asiṃ datvā dasabalassa santikaṃ āgamma vanditvā ṭhitakova “gāthaṃ vadatha,
atk-s0301a:715_18: bho gotamā”ti vatvā bhagavatā vuttaṃ pariyāpuṇitvāti attho.
atk-s0301a:716_3: imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne mā avaca,
atk-s0301a:716_4: rañño bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā vosānapiṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi,
atk-s0301a:716_6: Atha rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi,
atk-s0301a:716_7: pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a:716_8: So sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā taṃdivasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:716_9: Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0301a:716_10: Rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu.
atk-s0301a:717_0: Nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsīti so kira māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:717_2: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti?
atk-s0301a:717_7: Diṭṭhadhammikena ceva atthena samparāyikena cāti ettha sallikhitasarīratā diṭṭhadhammikattho nāma,
atk-s0301a:717_9: Bhojane mattaññutā hi sīlaṅgaṃ nāma hotīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:719_7: Mahākosalaraññā kira bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dentena dvinnaṃ rajjānaṃ antare satasahassuṭṭhāno kāsigāmo nāma dhītu dinno.
atk-s0301a:719_8: Ajātasattunā ca pitari mārite mātāpissa rañño viyogasokena nacirasseva matā.
atk-s0301a:719_11: mayhaṃ pitu santako gāmo”ti tassatthāya aḍḍaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a:719_12: Ajātasattupi “mayhaṃ mātu santako”ti tassa gāmassatthāya dvepi mātulabhāgineyyā yujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:720_4: Dukkhaṃ setīti jitāni hatthiādīni anusocanto dukkhaṃ sayissati.
atk-s0301a:720_5: Idaṃ bhagavā puna tassa jayakāraṇaṃ disvā āha.
atk-s0301a:720_6: Jayaṃ veraṃ pasavatīti jinanto veraṃ pasavati,
atk-s0301a:722_1: Pañcame abbhuyyāsīti parājaye garahappatto “ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rattibhāge
atk-s0301a:722_2: buddharakkhitena nāma vuḍḍhapabbajitena dhammarakkhitassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa “sace rājā imañca upāyaṃ
atk-s0301a:723_0: Yāvassa upakappatīti yāva tassa upakappati sayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:723_6: Jetāraṃ labhate jayanti jayanto puggalo pacchā jetārampi labhati.
atk-s0301a:723_11: So vilutto viluppatīti so vilumpako vilumpiyati. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:725_1: Chaṭṭhe upasaṅkamīti mallikāya deviyā gabbhavuṭṭhānakāle sūtigharaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:725_7: Seyyāti dandhapaññasmā elamūgaputtato ekaccā itthīyeva seyyā.
atk-s0301a:727_5: Evameva khoti hatthipadaṃ viya hi kārāpakaappamādo,
atk-s0301a:727_7: Te hatthipade sesapadāni viya appamāde samodhānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0301a:727_9: Yathā ca hatthipadaṃ sesapadānaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0301a:727_11: Mahaggatalokuttaradhammānampi hesa paṭilābhakaṭṭhena lokiyopi samāno aggova hoti.
atk-s0301a:728_0: Appamādaṃ pasaṃsantīti “etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabbo”ti appamādameva pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0301a:728_1: Yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0301a:728_2: tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho.
atk-s0301a:730_1: Aṭṭhame so ca kho kalyāṇamittassāti so cāyaṃ dhammo kalyāṇamittasseva svākkhāto nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a:730_4: kalyāṇamittassa pana sussūsantassa saddahantassa atthaṃ pūreti bhesajjaṃ viya vaḷañjantassa na itarassāti.
atk-s0301a:731_1: “ayaṃ samaṇadhammo nāma ovādake anusāsake kalyāṇamitte sati paccattapurisakāre ṭhitassa sampajjati,
atk-s0301a:731_5: “ahaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhito nippadesaṃ cintetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0301a:731_9: Yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatāti yā esā kalyāṇamittatā nāma,
atk-s0301a:731_18: yathā ca mātāpitaro nissāya uppannesu puttesu “ettakaṃ mātito nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0301a:731_23: kalyāṇamittatāya pana upaḍḍhaguṇo labbhatīti therassa ajjhāsayena upaḍḍhaṃ nāma jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a:731_24: sakalaguṇo paṭilabbhatīti bhagavato ajjhāsayena sakalaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a:731_26: Atthato kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya laddhā sīlasamādhivipassanāvasena cattāro khandhā.
atk-s0301a:732_2: bahussuto tvaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidappatto aṭṭha vare gahetvā maṃ upaṭṭhahasi,
atk-s0301a:732_8: “cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sabbaṃ kalyāṇamittamūlakameva hotī”ti sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a:733_1: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetītiādīsu aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0301a:734_2: sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0301a:734_7: Visesato panettha sammādiṭṭhi sahajātadhamme sammā dasseti.
atk-s0301a:735_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti,
atk-s0301a:735_2: Kiccato pana sammādiṭṭhi dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a:735_5: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a:735_8: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a:736_0: Evaṃ tāva “sammādiṭṭhi”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbo.
atk-s0301a:736_13: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:736_14: Tathā hi ayaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0301a:737_0: Kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0301a:737_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhi yathāvuttena pakārena kilese ca pariccajati,
atk-s0301a:738_0: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-s0301a:738_2: Ayañhi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā sammādiṭṭhi kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0301a:739_2: Tasmāti yasmā sakalo ariyamaggopi kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya labbhati, tasmā.
atk-s0301a:741_4: Ko pana vādo rūpiyassāti suvaṇṇarajatatambalohakāḷalohaphālakacchapakādibhedassa ghanakatassa ceva paribhogabhājanādibhedassa
atk-s0301a:741_10: Tipakkhavasananti tīṇi khaṇḍāni dvīsu ṭhānesu sibbitvā katanivāsanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:742_1: Uddhaggikantiādīsu uparūparibhūmīsu phaladānavasena uddhaṃ aggamassāti uddhaggikā.
atk-s0301a:742_4: Suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato saggasaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0301a:743_1: Settodakāti vīcīnaṃ bhinnaṭṭhāne udakassa setatāya setodakā.
atk-s0301a:743_4: taṃ udakaṃ jano bhājanāni pūretvā neva hareyya.
atk-s0301a:743_9: Kiccakaro ca hotīti attanā kattabbakiccakaro ceva kusalakiccakaro ca,
atk-s0301a:745_1: Dasame piṇḍapātena paṭipādesīti piṇḍapātena saddhiṃ saṃyojesi,
atk-s0301a:745_4: Pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosīti so kira aññesupi divasesu taṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ passati,
atk-s0301a:745_6: Tasmiṃ pana divase ayaṃ padumavatideviyā tatiyaputto taggarasikhī paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0301a:745_7: vītināmetvā pubbaṇhasamaye vuṭṭhāya anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā manosilātale nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0301a:745_8: bandhitvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0301a:745_9: nagaradvāre oruyha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya nagaravāsīnaṃ gharadvāresu sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapento
atk-s0301a:745_10: viya pāsādikehi abhikkantādīhi anupubbena seṭṭhino gharadvāraṃ sampatto.
atk-s0301a:745_11: Taṃdivasañca seṭṭhi pātova uṭṭhāya paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā,
atk-s0301a:745_15: taṃdivasaṃ pāto bhutvā nisinnattā dānacittaṃ uppādetvā,
atk-s0301a:746_1: “mayā ettakena kālena imassa ‘dethā’ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0301a:746_2: dāpentopi ca ajja na yassa vā tassa vā dāpeti,
atk-s0301a:746_4: yaṃ vā taṃ vā adatvā paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti,
atk-s0301a:746_5: gharā nikkhamma paccekabuddhaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ ādāya antonivesane paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0301a:746_6: suparisuddhehi sālitaṇḍulehi bhattaṃ sampādetvā tadanurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ byañjanaṃ supeyyañca sallakkhetvā
atk-s0301a:746_7: pattaṃ pūretvā bahi gandhehi samalaṅkaritvā paccekabuddhassa hatthesu patiṭṭhapetvā vandi.
atk-s0301a:746_9: “aññesampi paccekabuddhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti aparibhuñjitvāva anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a:746_10: Sopi kho seṭṭhi bāhirato āgacchanto paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mayaṃ “tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dethā”ti vatvā pakkantā,
atk-s0301a:746_15: So cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ asakkonto pacchā vippaṭisārī āhosīti.
atk-s0301a:747_1: Bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesīti tadā kirassa avibhatteyeva kuṭumbe mātāpitaro ca jeṭṭhabhātā ca kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:747_5: “ayaṃ dāso ayaṃ dāsī idaṃ yānaṃ idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santaka”nti.
atk-s0301a:748_3: idānevassa kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ vāsiṃ ādāya –
atk-s0301a:748_5: araññaṃ gacchāmā”ti taṃ araññaṃ netvā viravantaṃ viravantaṃ māretvā āvāṭe pakkhipitvā paṃsunā paṭicchādesi.
atk-s0301a:748_9: Ekapiṇḍapātadānasmiñhi ekāva cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na deti,
atk-s0301a:749_1: Anujīvinoti ekaṃ mahākulaṃ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti,
atk-s0301a:749_3: Sabbaṃ nādāya gantabbanti sabbametaṃ na ādiyitvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:753_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena tamena yuttoti tamo.
atk-s0301a:754_13: mahārājāti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiṃyeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalaṃ kappampi saṃsarati,
atk-s0301a:754_16: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:755_0: Ettha ca “nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vā”tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-s0301a:755_5: Na lābhītiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca.
atk-s0301a:758_6: Piyā manāpāti rañño kira mātari matāya ayyikā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭijaggi,
atk-s0301a:758_9: Hatthiratanenāti satasahassagghanako hatthī satasahassagghanakena alaṅkārena alaṅkato hatthiratanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a:758_12: Sabbāni tāni bhedanadhammānīti tesu hi kiñci kariyamānameva bhijjati,
atk-s0301a:758_16: evameva sattesupi koci paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā marati,
atk-s0301a:761_2: Bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiyaṃ mahālābhasakkāro udapādi bhikkhusaṅghassa ca.
atk-s0301a:761_3: Titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā hutvā kulesu evaṃ kanthentā vicaranti –
atk-s0301a:761_13: Yuttaṃ nu kho sayampi bhikkhācāranissitena paresaṃ bhikkhācāranissitānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ antarāyaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0301a:761_21: evaṃ sā kathā nijjhattiṃ na gaccheyya,
atk-s0301a:761_22: imassa mahājanassa sannipatitakāleyeva naṃ nijjhāpessāmī”ti ekaṃ chaṇadivasaṃ āgamento tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0301a:762_0: Aparena samayena mahāchaṇe sampatte “ayaṃ imassa kālo”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0301a:762_1: “saddhā vā assaddhā vā sammādiṭṭhikā vā micchādiṭṭhikā vā geharakkhake dārake vā mātugāme vā ṭhapetvā avasesā ye vihāraṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0301a:762_3: Sayampi pātova nhatvā katapātarāso sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito mahatā balakāyena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:762_5: “bhagavā tumhe kira evaṃ vadatha ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ…pe…
atk-s0301a:762_6: na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala’nti evaṃ pucchituṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a:762_8: pañhaṃ kathento ca me bhagavā avasāne titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ bhañjissatī”ti.
atk-s0301a:762_9: So pañhaṃ pucchanto kattha nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0301a:763_0: Evaṃ vutte rājā yehi manussehi titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ ārocitaṃ,
atk-s0301a:763_2: Te raññā olokitamattāva maṅkubhūtā adhomukhā pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ lekhamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Rājā –
atk-s0301a:763_4: hatā titthiyā”ti mahājanaṃ sāvento mahāsaddena abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:763_6: “bhagavā cittaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādīsu yattha katthaci pasīdati,
atk-s0301a:763_14: pañhākathanaṃ pana mayhaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā sīlavato khotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:763_15: Tattha idha tyassāti idha te assa.
atk-s0301a:764_0: Kāmacchando pahīnotiādīsu arahattamaggena kāmacchando pahīno hoti,
atk-s0301a:764_6: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti asekkhassa sīlakkhandho asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma.
atk-s0301a:764_8: Ettha ca purimehi catūhi padehi lokiyalokuttarasīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo kathitā.
atk-s0301a:765_5: “ayaṃ jātisampanno”ti evaṃ jātikāraṇā asūraṃ na bhareyya.
atk-s0301a:767_0: Idāni etesu araññasenāsanesu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācāravattaṃ ācikkhanto annaṃ pānantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:767_2: Vippasannenāti khīṇāsavassa dentopi sakaṅkhena kilesamalinena cittena adatvā vippasanneneva cittena dadeyya.
atk-s0301a:768_4: Dātāraṃ abhivassatīti yathā ākāse samuṭṭhitameghato nikkhantā udakadhārā pathaviṃ sinehayantī tementī kiledayantī abhivassati,
atk-s0301a:768_5: evameva ayampi dāyakassa abbhantare uppannā puññadhārā tameva dātāraṃ anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti.
atk-s0301a:770_1: Pañcame muddhāvasittānanti khattiyābhisekena muddhani avasittānaṃ katābhisekānaṃ.
atk-s0301a:770_7: Esa kira rājā divasassa tikkhattuṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:770_9: Tassa nibaddhaṃ gacchato balakāyo mahāpi hoti appopi.
atk-s0301a:770_11: “ayaṃ rājā avelāya appena balena samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:770_15: Atha tesaṃyeva abbhantarato eko puriso nikkhamitvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0301a:770_16: Rājā mahantaṃ balakāyaṃ ādāya andhavanaṃ parivāretvā te sabbe gahetvā andhavanato yāva nagaradvārā maggassa
atk-s0301a:770_17: ubhosu passesu yathā aññamaññaṃ cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanibandhitvā olokenti,
atk-s0301a:770_18: evaṃ āsannāni sūlāni ropāpetvā sūlesu uttāsesi.
atk-s0301a:771_3: mādise nāma sammāsambuddhe dhuravihāre vasante tayā evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0301a:771_5: athāyaṃ rājā maṅku hutvā santhambhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0301a:771_6: pariyāyena dhammaṃ kathentasseva me sallakkhessatī”ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:771_12: Nippothento āgacchatīti pathavitalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā sabbe satte saṇhakaraṇīyaṃ tiṇacuṇṇaṃ viya karonto pisanto āgacchati.
atk-s0301a:772_0: Aññatra dhammacariyāyāti ṭhapetvā dhammacariyaṃ aññaṃ kātabbaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a:772_7: Hatthiyuddhānīti nāḷāgirisadise hemakappane nāge abhiruyha yujjhitabbayuddhāni.
atk-s0301a:772_11: Na hi sakkā tehi jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0301a:772_14: Vehāsaṭṭhanti cammapasibbake pūretvā tulāsaṅghāṭādīsu laggetvā ceva niyyuhādīsu ca pūretvā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:772_16: Yathā dve janā ekena maggena na gacchanti evaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0301a:773_1: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu cāti idha dveyeva pabbatā gahitā,
atk-s0301a:773_2: rājovāde pana “jarā āgacchati sabbayobbanaṃ vilumpamānā”ti evaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ byādhi vipattīti cattāropete āgatāva.
atk-s0301a:773_3: Tasmāti yasmā hatthiyuddhādīhi jarāmaraṇaṃ jinituṃ na sakkā, tasmā.
atk-s0301a:783_1: Mārasaṃyuttassa paṭhame uruvelāyaṃ viharatīti paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo uruvelagāmaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0301a:783_4: Māro pāpimāti attano visayaṃ atikkamituṃ paṭipanne satte māretīti māro.
atk-s0301a:784_2: Amaraṃ tapanti amaratapaṃ amarabhāvatthāya kataṃ lūkhatapaṃ,
atk-s0301a:784_5: “sabbaṃ tapaṃ mayhaṃ atthāvahaṃ na bhavatī”ti ñatvā.
atk-s0301a:784_6: Phiyārittaṃva dhammanīti araññe thale phiyārittaṃ viya.
atk-s0301a:784_8: yathā araññe thale nāvaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍassa pūretvā mahājanā abhirūhitvā phiyārittaṃ gahetvā saṃkaḍḍheyyuṃ ceva uppīleyyuṃ ca,
atk-s0301a:784_9: so mahājanassa vāyāmo ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi nāvāya gamanaṃ asādhento niratthako bhaveyya na anatthāvaho,
atk-s0301a:784_10: evameva ahaṃ ‘sabbaṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ anatthāvahaṃ hotī’ti ñatvā vissajjesinti.
atk-s0301a:785_0: Idāni taṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ pahāya yena maggena buddho jāto,
atk-s0301a:785_5: Maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvayanti imaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikameva ariyamaggaṃ bodhatthāya bhāvayanto.
atk-s0301a:785_13: Nihatoti tvaṃ mayā nihato parājito. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:787_1: Dutiye rattandhakāratimisāyanti rattiṃ andhabhāvakārake mahātame caturaṅge tamasi.
atk-s0301a:787_2: Abbhokāse nisinno hotīti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake mahācīvaraṃ sīse ṭhapetvā padhānaṃ pariggaṇhamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0301a:788_0: Nanu ca tathāgatassa abhāvito vā maggo,
atk-s0301a:788_6: “Anāgate hi kulaputtā mayā gatamaggaṃ āvajjitvā abbhokāsavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā padhānakammaṃ karissantī”ti sampassamāno satthā evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a:788_10: Evamassa sīsaṃ hotīti evarūpaṃ tassa kāḷavaṇṇaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ mahāpāsāṇasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:789_0: Subhāsubhanti dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranto sundarāsundaraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā āgatosīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:789_3: pure bodhāya vā chabbassāni dukkarakārikasamayasaṅkhātaṃ dīghakālaṃ.
atk-s0301a:789_4: Vaṇṇaṃ katvā subhāsubhanti sundarañca asundarañca nānappakāraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatosīti attho.
atk-s0301a:789_6: yena vaṇṇena māro vibhiṃsakatthāya bhagavato santikaṃ na āgatapubbo.
atk-s0301a:789_8: Alaṃ te tenāti alaṃ tuyhaṃ etena māravibhiṃsākāradassanabyāpārena. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:791_4: Na te mārassa baddhagūti te tuyhaṃ mārassa baddhacarā sissā antevāsikā na honti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:793_4: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ attanā vīriyaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussati,
atk-s0301a:794_1: Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā mānusā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā ca mārapāsā nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a:794_5: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa tvaṃ mama visayato na muccissasi.
atk-s0301a:796_5: (Pavāretvā) divase divase yojanaparamaṃ gacchantā carathāti vadati.
atk-s0301a:796_6: Mā ekena dveti ekamaggena dve janā mā agamittha.
atk-s0301a:797_2: Ādimajjhapariyosānañca nāmetaṃ sāsanassa ca desanāya ca vasena duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:797_12: Desanāya pana catuppadikāya gāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo ādi,
atk-s0301a:798_1: Sabyañjananti byañjanehi ceva padehi ca paripūraṃ katvā desetha.
atk-s0301a:799_1: dukūlasāṇiyā paṭicchannā viya catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthā santīti attho.
atk-s0301a:799_5: sujātāya vā pitu senānī nāma nigamo.
atk-s0301a:799_6: Tenupasaṅkamissāmīti nāhaṃ tumhe uyyojetvā pariveṇādīni kāretvā upaṭṭhākādīhi paricariyamāno viharissāmi,
atk-s0301a:799_7: tiṇṇaṃ pana jaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā dhammameva desetuṃ upasaṅkamissāmīti.
atk-s0301a:799_12: imasmiṃ pana ekasmimpi dhammaṃ desente mayhaṃ cittassādaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a:801_8: ghaṭṭayissāmi na”nti vuttappakāraṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā niyāmabhūmiyaṃ ito cito ca sañcarantaṃ vijjulatālokena disvā,
atk-s0301a:802_2: Ṭhassāmi caṅkamissāmi nisīdissāmi nipajjissāmīti etadatthāya yo suññāgārāni sevatīti attho.
atk-s0301a:802_3: So muni attasaññatoti so buddhamuni hatthapādakukkuccābhāvena saṃyatattabhāvo.
atk-s0301a:802_4: Vossajja careyya tattha soti so tasmiṃ attabhāve ālayaṃ nikantiṃ vossajjitvā pahāya careyya.
atk-s0301a:802_5: Patirūpaṃ hi tathāvidhassa tanti tādisassa taṃsaṇṭhitassa buddhamunino taṃ attabhāve nikantiṃ vossajjitvā caraṇaṃ nāma patirūpaṃ yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ.
atk-s0301a:803_4: Tepi hi tasmiṃ kāle yakkhā viya upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0301a:803_6: Tatthāti tesu bheravesu suññāgāragato buddhamuni lomacalanamattakampi na karoti.
atk-s0301a:804_1: Tattha phaleyyāti kākapadaṃ viya hīrahīraso phaleyya.
atk-s0301a:804_2: Caleyyāti pokkharapatte vātāhato udakabindu viya caleyya.
atk-s0301a:804_3: Sallampi ce urasi pakappayeyyunti tikhiṇasattisallaṃ cepi urasmiṃ cāreyeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:804_5: Tāṇaṃ na karontīti tikhiṇe salle urasmiṃ cāriyamāne bhayena gumbantarakandarādīni pavisantā tāṇaṃ karonti nāma.
atk-s0301a:804_6: Buddhā pana samucchinnasabbabhayā evarūpaṃ tāṇaṃ nāma na karonti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:806_2: Buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
atk-s0301a:806_3: udakampi pokkharapatte pakkhittaṃ viya vivaṭṭitvā gacchati.
atk-s0301a:806_4: Apica kho dhotapādake gehe pāde dhovitvā pavisanaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vattaṃ.
atk-s0301a:806_12: Upasaṅkamīti samaṇo gotamo sabbarattiṃ abbhokāse caṅkamitvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā niddāyati,
atk-s0301a:807_2: Kiṃ nu soppasīti kasmā nu supasi?
atk-s0301a:807_5: Suññamagāranti suññaṃ me gharaṃ laddhanti soppasīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:808_0: Jālinīti tayo bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena “ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārasataṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā tena tena attano koṭṭhāsabhūtena jālena jālinī.
atk-s0301a:808_1: Visattikāti rūpādīsu tattha tattha visattatāya visamūlatāya visaparibhogatāya ca visattikā.
atk-s0301a:808_3: Sabbūpadhi parikkhayāti sabbesaṃ khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇabhedānaṃ upadhīnaṃ parikkhayā.
atk-s0301a:808_6: Kasmā tvaṃ uṇhayāguyaṃ nilīyituṃ asakkontī khuddakamakkhikā viya antanteneva ujjhāyanto āhiṇḍasīti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:812_1: Navame appaṃ vā bhiyyoti bhiyyo jīvanto aparaṃ vassasataṃ jīvituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a:812_2: paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati.
atk-s0301a:813_0: Na naṃ hīḷeti taṃ āyuṃ “appakamida”nti na hīḷeyya.
atk-s0301a:813_1: Khīramatto vāti yathā daharo kumāro uttānaseyyako khīraṃ pivitvā dukūlacumbaṭake nipanno asaññī viya niddāyati,
atk-s0301a:813_2: kassaci āyuṃ appaṃ vā dīghaṃ vāti na cinteti,
atk-s0301a:813_4: Careyyādittasīso vāti āyuṃ parittanti ñatvā pajjalitasīso viya careyya. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:815_1: Dasame nemīva rathakubbaranti yathā divasaṃ gacchantassa rathassa cakkanemi kubbaraṃ anupariyāyati na vijahati,
atk-s0301a:819_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame nisinnoti pubbe vuttanayeneva padhānaṃ pariggaṇhanto nisinno.
atk-s0301a:821_2: Buddhānaṃ panesa paññācakkhuṃ vināsetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a:821_3: parisāya bheravārammaṇaṃ sāvento vā dassento vā sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:821_4: Vijitāvī nu maññasīti kiṃ nu tvaṃ “vijitavijayo aha”nti maññasi?
atk-s0301a:823_2: Udāhu kāveyyamattoti udāhu yathā kavi kabbaṃ cintento tena kabbakaraṇena matto sayati,
atk-s0301a:823_5: Kimidaṃ soppase vāti kasmā idaṃ soppaṃ soppasiyeva?
atk-s0301a:823_7: Mayhaṃ hi asaṅgaho nāma saṅgahavipanno vā attho natthi.
atk-s0301a:823_9: Jaggaṃ na saṅketi yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsu jagganto saṅkati,
atk-s0301a:823_11: Napi bhemi sottunti yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsuyeva supituṃ bhāyati,
atk-s0301a:823_13: Nānutapanti māmanti yathā ācariyassa vā antevāsikassa vā aphāsuke jāte uddesaparipucchāya ṭhitattā antevāsiṃ rattindivā atikkamantā anutapanti,
atk-s0301a:823_15: Na hi mayhaṃ kiñci apariniṭṭhitakammaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0301a:823_16: Tenevāha hāniṃ na passāmi kuhiñci loketi. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:825_2: Mā sajjittho tadācaranti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ ācaranto mā laggi.
atk-s0301a:825_3: Dhammakathaṃ kathentassa hi ekacce sādhukāraṃ dadanti,
atk-s0301a:829_1: Chaṭṭhe pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ upādāyāti pañca upādānakkhandhe ādiyitvā,
atk-s0301a:829_8: “ayaṃ no adhigantabbo attho”ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā.
atk-s0301a:829_10: Sabbacetaso samannāharitvāti sabbena tena kammakārakacittena samannāharitvā.
atk-s0301a:830_3: Evaṃ tattha virajjatīti “eso ahaṃ na homi,
atk-s0301a:830_4: etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotī”ti passanto evaṃ tesu khandhesu virajjati.
atk-s0301a:832_1: Sattame phassāyatanānanti sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhena chadvārikassa phassassa āyatanānaṃ.
atk-s0301a:832_3: Pathavī maññe undrīyatīti ayaṃ mahāpathavī paṭapaṭasaddaṃ kurumānā viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a:832_4: Ettha loko vimucchitoti etesu chasu ārammaṇesu loko adhimucchito.
atk-s0301a:834_1: Aṭṭhame pāhunakāni bhavantīti tathārūpe nakkhatte tattha tattha pesetabbāni pāhunakāni bhavanti,
atk-s0301a:834_3: Sayaṃcaraṇadivase samavayajātigottā kumārakā tato tato sannipatanti.
atk-s0301a:834_4: Kumārikāyopi attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkatā tahaṃ tahaṃ vicaranti.
atk-s0301a:834_5: Tatra kumārikāyopi yathārucikānaṃ kumārakānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesenti,
atk-s0301a:834_6: kumārakāpi kumārikānaṃ aññasmiṃ asati antamaso mālāguḷenapi parikkhipanti.
atk-s0301a:834_8: Taṃdivasaṃ kira pañcasatā kumārikāyo uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantiyo paṭipathe satthāraṃ disvā chaṇapūvaṃ dadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:834_11: Māro tāsaṃ sampattiyā antarāyaṃ karissāmīti anvāvisi.
atk-s0301a:834_12: Pāḷiyaṃ pana mā samaṇo gotamo piṇḍamalatthāti ettakaṃyeva vuttanti.
atk-s0301a:835_0: Kiṃ pana satthā mārāvaṭṭanaṃ ajānitvā paviṭṭhoti?
atk-s0301a:836_0: Upasaṅkamīti amittavijayena viya tuṭṭho sakalagāme kaṭacchumattampi bhattaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gāmiyamanussavesena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:836_1: Tathāhaṃ karissāmīti idaṃ so musā bhāsati.
atk-s0301a:836_4: atha naṃ gāmadārakā ‘sakalagāme caritvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamma puna paviṭṭhosī’tiādīni vatvā uppaṇḍessantī”ti.
atk-s0301a:836_6: “sacāyaṃ maṃ evaṃ viheṭhessati muddhamasseva sattadhā phalissatī”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya apavisitvā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0301a:837_2: Na me pāpaṃ vipaccatīti mama pāpaṃ na paccati.
atk-s0301a:837_3: Nipphalaṃ etanti kiṃ nu tvaṃ evaṃ maññasi?
atk-s0301a:837_5: atthi tayā katassa pāpassa phalanti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a:837_7: Ābhassarā yathāti yathā ābhassarā devā sappītikajjhānena yāpentā pītibhakkhā nāma honti,
atk-s0301a:839_5: Mama cakkhusamphassaviññāṇāyatananti cakkhuviññāṇena sampayutto cakkhusamphassopi viññāṇāyatanampi mamevāti.
atk-s0301a:839_6: Ettha ca cakkhusamphassena viññāṇasampayuttakā dhammā gahitā,
atk-s0301a:840_1: cakkhūti yaṃ loke timirakācādīhi upaddutaṃ anekarogāyatanaṃ upakkavipakkaṃ antamaso kāṇacakkhupi,
atk-s0301a:841_0: Yaṃ vadantīti yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ “mama ida”nti vadanti.
atk-s0301a:841_1: Ye vadanti mamanti cāti ye ca puggalā “mama”nti vadanti.
atk-s0301a:841_2: Ettha ce te mano atthīti etesu ca ṭhānesu yadi cittaṃ atthi.
atk-s0301a:841_3: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa mayhaṃ visayato na muccissasi.
atk-s0301a:841_6: Ye vadantīti yepi puggalā evaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0301a:841_8: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti bhavayonigatiādīsu mayhaṃ gatamaggampi na passasi. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:843_2: Ajinaṃ ajāpayanti parassa dhanajāniṃ akarontena akārāpentena.
atk-s0301a:843_4: Iti bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje vijite daṇḍakarapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññavasena evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0301a:843_5: Upasaṅkamīti “samaṇo gotamo ‘sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu’nti cintesi,
atk-s0301a:843_16: Paricitāti sātaccakiriyāya suparicitā katā issāsassa avirādhitavedhihattho viya.
atk-s0301a:844_2: dvikkhattumpi tāva mahanto suvaṇṇapabbato ekassa nālaṃ,
atk-s0301a:844_4: Iti vidvā samañcareti evaṃ jānanto samaṃ careyya.
atk-s0301a:844_8: Kathaṃ nameyyāti so jantu tesu dukkhassa nidānabhūtesu kāmesu kena kāraṇena nameyya.
atk-s0301a:844_11: Tasseva jantu vinayāya sikkheti tasseva upadhissa vinayāya sikkheyya. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:848_2: Ajinakkhipanivatthoti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃ nivattho ekaṃ pāruto.
atk-s0301a:848_3: Udumbaradaṇḍanti appicchabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ īsakaṃ vaṅkaṃ udumbaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0301a:848_4: Etadavocāti loke brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ nāma sussūsanti,
atk-s0301a:848_6: pabbajitesupi mahallakassāti mahallakabrāhmaṇassa pabbajitavesaṃ gahetvā padhānabhūmiyaṃ kammaṃ karonte
atk-s0301a:848_7: te bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā etaṃ “daharā bhavanto”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a:848_8: Okampetvāti hanukena uraṃ paharanto adhonataṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a:848_9: Jivhaṃ nillāletvāti kabaramahājivhaṃ nīharitvā uddhamadho ubhayapassesu ca lāletvā.
atk-s0301a:848_13: Pakkāmīti tumhe jānantānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā attanova tele paccissathāti vatvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gahetvā gato. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:850_2: suladdhaṃ vata meti evarūpassa satthu ceva dhammassa ca sabrahmacārīnañca laddhattā mayhaṃ lābhā mayhaṃ suladdhanti.
atk-s0301a:850_3: So kirāyasmā pacchā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā “arahattaṃ gahessāmī”ti pāsādikaṃ tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0301a:850_4: buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittakallataṃ uppādetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā nisinno.
atk-s0301a:850_6: Upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ samiddhi bhikkhu pāsādikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnasadiso,
atk-s0301a:850_7: yāva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0301a:850_9: Gaccha tvanti satthā sakalajambudīpaṃ olokento “tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī”ti addasa,
atk-s0301a:850_11: Satipaññā ca me buddhāti mayā sati ca paññā ca ñātā.
atk-s0301a:850_12: Karassu rūpānīti bahūnipi vibhiṃsakārahāni rūpāni karassu.
atk-s0301a:850_13: Neva maṃ byādhayissasīti maṃ neva vedhayissasi na kampassesi. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:852_1: Tatiye isigilipasseti isigilissa nāma pabbatassa passe.
atk-s0301a:852_4: ārammaṇe ca adhimuccatīti lokiyasamāpatti sāmayikā cetovimutti nāma.
atk-s0301a:852_8: Therassa kira vātapittasemhavasena anusāyiko ābādho atthi,
atk-s0301a:852_9: tena samādhissa sappāye upakārakadhamme pūretuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a:853_0: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthaṃ āhareyyanti so kira cintesi,
atk-s0301a:853_1: yasmā parihīnajjhānassa kālaṅkaroto anibaddhā gati hoti,
atk-s0301a:853_7: satthāharaṇañca nāmetaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhassa hoti.
atk-s0301a:853_8: Yo evaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hoti,
atk-s0301a:853_9: so mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā arahattampi gahetuṃ samattho hoti,
atk-s0301a:853_10: mayā pana paṭibāhitopi esa na oramissati,
atk-s0301a:853_11: satthārā paṭibāhito oramissatī”ti therassa atthakāmo viya hutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:854_1: Pāde vandāmi cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā tava pāde vandāmi.
atk-s0301a:854_6: Satthaṃ āharitaṃ hotīti thero kira “kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā jīvitenā”ti?
atk-s0301a:854_9: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā taṃyeva vedanaṃ pariggahetvā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0301a:855_0: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya –
atk-s0301a:855_2: athassa arahattappatti ca iriyāpathakopanañca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a:855_6: athassa arahattappatti ca rogato vuṭṭhānañca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a:855_8: Keci pana tasmiṃyeva iriyāpathe tasmiñca roge parinibbānavasenettha samasīsitaṃ paññāpenti.
atk-s0301a:855_9: Yassa pana āsavakkhayo ca jīvitakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a:855_12: “yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca,
atk-s0301a:856_0: Ettha ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni.
atk-s0301a:856_9: taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ vā hoti aparipuṇṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0301a:856_10: Tikhiṇena asinā sīse chijjantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva,
atk-s0301a:856_11: cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya paññāyati.
atk-s0301a:857_0: Samūlaṃ taṇhamabbuyhāti avijjāmūlena samūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ arahattamaggena uppāṭetvā.
atk-s0301a:858_3: tathāpissa dakkhiṇena passena paricitasayanattā sīsaṃ dakkhiṇatova parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:858_5: Tasmiṃ hi khaṇe dhūmavalāhakā viya timiravalāhakā viya ca uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:858_12: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī”ti khuddakadārakavaṇṇī hutvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:860_1: Catutthe satta vassānīti pure bodhiyā chabbassāni,
atk-s0301a:860_3: Otārāpekkhoti “sace samaṇassa gotamassa kāyadvārādīsu kiñcideva ananucchavikaṃ passāmi,
atk-s0301a:863_0: Upasaṅkamīti “ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ atigahetvā gamissāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:864_1: Vittaṃ nu jīnoti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā jitosi nu.
atk-s0301a:864_3: kiṃ nu antogāme pamāṇātikkantaṃ pāpakammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0301a:864_4: yena aññesaṃ mukhaṃ oloketuṃ avisahanto araññe vicarasi?
atk-s0301a:865_2: Anāsavo jhāyāmīti nittaṇho hutvā dvīhi jhānehi jhāyāmi.
atk-s0301a:866_0: Sace maggaṃ anubuddhanti yadi tayā maggo anubuddho.
atk-s0301a:868_6: atha so tattha assādaṃ alabhitvāva vāyaso etto apakkameyya,
atk-s0301a:868_8: evaṃ mayampi so kāko viya selaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja assādaṃ vā santhavaṃ vā alabhantā gotamā nibbinditvā apagacchāma.
atk-s0301a:870_5: Upasaṅkamiṃsūti “gopālakadārakaṃ viya daṇḍakena bhūmiṃ lekhaṃ datvā ativiya dummano hutvā nisinno.
atk-s0301a:871_1: Āraññamiva kuñjaranti yathā araññato pesitagaṇikārahatthiniyo āraññakaṃ kuñjaraṃ itthikuttadassanena palobhetvā bandhitvā ānayanti,
atk-s0301a:872_2: mayaṃ taṃ ānessāmā”ti pitaraṃ samassāsetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:872_4: Ekasataṃ ekasatanti ekekaṃ sataṃ sataṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a:873_7: piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ eko jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ.
atk-s0301a:873_9: teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī na sampajjatīti.
atk-s0301a:874_4: katamena jhānena bahulaṃ jhāyantaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ kāmasaññā alabhitvāva paribāhirā hontīti.
atk-s0301a:875_9: Imesu tīsu mūlakilesesu gahitesu diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a:876_4: Gaṇasaṅghacārīti gaṇe ca saṅghe ca caratīti satthā gaṇasaṅghacārī nāma.
atk-s0301a:876_5: Addhā carissantīti aññepi saddhā bahujanā ekaṃsena carissanti.
atk-s0301a:877_1: maccurājassa hatthato acchinditvā nibbānapāraṃ nayissatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:878_1: pātāle gādhamesathāti mahantaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ silaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā pātāle patiṭṭhagavesanaṃ viya.
atk-s0301a:878_2: Khāṇuṃva urasāsajjāti urasi khāṇuṃ paharitvā viya.
atk-s0301a:878_4: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgītikārā “idamavocā”ti desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā daddallamānāti gāthaṃ āhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:878_8: Tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva mālutoti yathā phalato bhaṭṭhaṃ simbalitūlaṃ vā poṭakitūlaṃ vā vāto panudati nīharati,
atk-s0301a:887_1: Bhikkhunīsaṃyuttassa paṭhame āḷavikāti āḷaviyaṃ jātā āḷavinagaratoyeva ca nikkhamma pabbajitā.
atk-s0301a:887_2: Andhavananti kassapasammāsambuddhassa cetiye navakammatthāya dhanaṃ samādapetvā āgacchantassa yasodharassa
atk-s0301a:887_3: nāma dhammabhāṇakassa ariyapuggalassa akkhīni uppāṭetvā tattheva akkhibhedappattehi pañcahi corasatehi
atk-s0301a:887_4: nivutthattā tato paṭṭhāya “andhavana”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:887_5: Taṃ kira sāvatthito dakkhiṇapasse gāvutamatte hoti rājārakkhāya guttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:887_6: Tattha pavivekakāmā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:887_7: Tasmā ayampi kāyavivekatthinī yena taṃ vanaṃ,
atk-s0301a:887_11: Na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padanti tvaṃ etaṃ nibbānapadaṃ vā nibbānagāmimaggapadaṃ vā na jānāsi.
atk-s0301a:887_13: Khandhāsaṃ adhikuṭṭanāti khandhā tesaṃ adhikuṭṭanabhaṇḍikā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:889_4: Yasmā vā dvīhi aṅgulehi kappāsavaṭṭiṃ gahetvā suttaṃ kantanti,
atk-s0301a:889_9: Kiñci vā pana aññasmīti aññaṃ vā kiñci “ahaṃ asmī”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena yassa siyā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:891_3: Pubbe kira sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kule asītikoṭidhanaṃ sabbaṃ aṅgārāva jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a:891_6: tassa puññena puna pākatikaṃ bhavissatī”ti suvaṇṇahiraññassa cāṭiyo pūretvā āpaṇe ṭhapetvā samīpe nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:891_8: “aḍḍhamāsakaṃ gahetvā dārusākaṃ āharissāmī”ti vīthiṃ gatā taṃ disvā kuṭumbikaṃ āha –
atk-s0301a:891_13: So “puññavatī esā bhavissatī”ti tassā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā āpaṇe bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā tassā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā evamāha –
atk-s0301a:891_16: Kiṃ sāmi duggatehi saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karosīti?
atk-s0301a:891_19: kuṭumbasāminī bhavissatīti naṃ gahetvā gharaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0301a:891_22: Sā duggatakule uppajjitvā mahākulaṃ gantvāpi “puttavināsaṃ pattāmhī”ti uppannabalavasokā puttassa sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0301a:891_23: vāretvā taṃ matakaḷevaraṃ ādāya nagare vippalapantī carati.
atk-s0301a:892_0: Ekadivasaṃ mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0301a:892_1: “puttassa me arogabhāvatthāya bhesajjaṃ detha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:892_2: Gaccha sāvatthiṃ āhiṇḍitvā yasmiṃ gehe matapubbo natthi,
atk-s0301a:892_5: Sā nagaraṃ pavisitvā dhuragehato paṭṭhāya bhagavatā vuttanayena gantvā siddhatthakaṃ yācantī ghare ghare,
atk-s0301a:892_6: “kuto tvaṃ evarūpaṃ gharaṃ passissasī”ti vuttā katipayāni gehāni āhiṇḍitvā –
atk-s0301a:892_8: na mayhaṃ puttassevā”ti sālāyaṃ chavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0301a:892_11: Imaṃ theriṃ sandhāya “atha kho kisāgotamī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:893_2: Accantaṃ mataputtāmhīti ettha antaṃ atītaṃ accantaṃ,
atk-s0301a:893_7: idāni mama puna puttamaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a:893_12: Sabbattha vihatā nandīti sabbesu khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsesu mama taṇhānandī vihatā.
atk-s0301a:895_1: Catutthe pañcaṅgikenāti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susiranti evaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgatena.
atk-s0301a:895_4: Pūtikāyenāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo niccaṃ uggharitapaggharitaṭṭhena pūtikāyova,
atk-s0301a:895_10: Santā samāpattīti aṭṭhavidhā lokiyasamāpatti ārammaṇasantatāya aṅgasantatāya ca santāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a:895_12: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhavānaṃ gahitattā gahite kāmabhave aṭṭhasu ca samāpattīsūti etesu sabbesu ṭhānesu mayhaṃ avijjātamo vihatoti vadati.
atk-s0301a:897_1: Pañcame supupphitagganti aggato paṭṭhāya suṭṭhu pupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:897_2: Na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātūti tava vaṇṇadhātusadisā dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu natthi,
atk-s0301a:897_3: tayā sadisā aññā bhikkhunī natthīti vadati.
