atk-s0301a:897_4: Idhāgatā tādisikā bhaveyyunti yathā tvaṃ idhāgatā kiñci santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā na labhasi,
atk-s0301a:897_6: Pakhumantarikāyanti dvinnaṃ akkhīnaṃ majjhe nāsavaṃsepi tiṭṭhantiṃ maṃ na passasi.
atk-s0301a:899_1: Chaṭṭhe ko nu taṃ idamādapayīti ko nu mandabuddhi bālo taṃ evaṃ gāhāpesi?
atk-s0301a:899_7: loke pana aggapuggalo satthā dhammaṃ desesī”ti dassetuṃ,
atk-s0301a:899_9: Tattha sacce nivesayīti paramatthasacce nibbāne nivesesi.
atk-s0301a:901_1: Sattame enti māravasaṃ punāti punappunaṃ maraṇamārakilesamāradevaputtamārānaṃ vasaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0301a:901_3: Agati yattha mārassāti yattha tuyhaṃ mārassa agati.
atk-s0301a:903_1: Aṭṭhame samaṇī viya dissasīti samaṇisadisā dissasi.
atk-s0301a:903_2: Kimiva carasi momūhāti kiṃ kāraṇā momūhā viya carasi?
atk-s0301a:904_0: Idāni “kaṃ nu uddissa muṇḍāsī”ti pañhaṃ kathentī atthi sakyakule jātotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:904_1: Tattha sabbābhibhūti sabbāni khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiādīni abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0301a:904_3: Sabbatthamaparājitoti sabbesu rāgādīsu vā mārayuddhe vā ajito.
atk-s0301a:904_7: Upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:906_1: Navame kenidaṃ pakatanti kena idaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0301a:908_1: Dasame nayidha sattupalabbhatīti imasmiṃ suddhasaṅkhārapuñje paramatthato satto nāma na upalabbhati.
atk-s0301a:908_2: Khandhesu santesūti pañcasu khandhesu vijjamānesu tena tenākārena vavatthitesu.
atk-s0301a:908_5: Nāññatra dukkhāti ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ añño neva sambhoti na nirujjhatīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:917_1: Brahmasaṃyuttassa paṭhame parivitakko udapādīti sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo ayaṃ cetaso vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0301a:917_3: Buddhabhūtassa aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle sakkena devānamindena ābhataṃ dantakaṭṭhañca osadhaharītakañca
atk-s0301a:917_4: khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamayapatte tapussabhallikānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0301a:918_10: Atakkāvacaroti takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
atk-s0301a:918_21: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
atk-s0301a:918_27: Tena tesaṃ bhagavā duvidhaṃ ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:919_5: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0301a:919_8: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni samanti,
atk-s0301a:919_11: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0301a:919_15: tasmā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:919_17: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
atk-s0301a:919_19: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-s0301a:919_22: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:920_2: Buddhānaṃ hi cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadāva honti.
atk-s0301a:920_3: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ kantitvā
atk-s0301a:920_4: galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti
atk-s0301a:920_5: evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0301a:920_11: evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa alaṃ desituṃ pariyattaṃ desituṃ.
atk-s0301a:921_2: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
atk-s0301a:921_3: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
atk-s0301a:921_4: te apassante ko sakkhissati evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0301a:925_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti?
atk-s0301a:925_2: tadevaṃ paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0301a:925_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ,
atk-s0301a:925_4: dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā. Athassa –
atk-s0301a:925_8: añjanamakkhitahattho viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā,
atk-s0301a:926_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
atk-s0301a:926_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanaṃ viya duranubodho.
atk-s0301a:926_3: Nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a:926_6: tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha,
atk-s0301a:926_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0301a:926_10: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho.
atk-s0301a:927_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0301a:927_2: “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0301a:927_4: Te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0301a:927_7: paṇīto vata bho dhammo’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti.
atk-s0301a:927_8: Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
atk-s0301a:928_0: Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0301a:928_3: Nassati vata bhoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi,
atk-s0301a:928_5: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-s0301a:928_6: Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0301a:928_7: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā.
atk-s0301a:928_9: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā paripākagatā padumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ,
atk-s0301a:928_10: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
atk-s0301a:929_1: Samalehi cintitoti samalehi chahi satthārehi cintito.
atk-s0301a:929_2: Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya,
atk-s0301a:929_3: visaṃ siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:929_5: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-s0301a:929_6: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ
atk-s0301a:930_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova.
atk-s0301a:930_1: Na hi tassa ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0301a:930_4: yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0301a:930_5: tathā tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutañāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ
atk-s0301a:930_6: apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ janataṃ avekkhassu upadhāraya upaparikkha.
atk-s0301a:930_8: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a:930_9: tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ,
atk-s0301a:930_11: atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ na kedārapāḷiyo
atk-s0301a:930_12: na kuṭiyo na tattha sayitamanussā paññāyeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:930_14: evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā,
atk-s0301a:930_15: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0301a:930_18: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
atk-s0301a:932_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0301a:933_5: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
atk-s0301a:934_34: iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0301a:934_36: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0301a:935_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānī ti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0301a:935_5: tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
atk-s0301a:935_10: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a:935_16: evamevaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0301a:936_0: Tattha “yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a:936_2: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a:936_4: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a:936_6: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a:936_15: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
atk-s0301a:937_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0301a:937_2: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0301a:937_3: sabbepi tīsu bhavesu satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
atk-s0301a:937_6: Ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā
atk-s0301a:937_7: acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
atk-s0301a:937_12: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā,
atk-s0301a:938_5: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu vissajjentu.
atk-s0301a:938_7: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ.
atk-s0301a:938_8: Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
atk-s0301a:939_2: Gate ca pana tasmiṃ bhagavā “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti?
atk-s0301a:939_4: pañcavaggiyānañca bahūpakārabhāvaṃ ñatvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetukāmo bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:941_1: Dutiye udapādīti ayaṃ vitakko pañcame sattāhe udapādi.
atk-s0301a:942_1: Devaggahaṇena cettha mārabrahmesu gahitesupi māro nāma vasavattī sabbesaṃ upari vasaṃ vatteti,
atk-s0301a:942_2: brahmā nāma mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati.
atk-s0301a:942_4: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasupi cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0301a:942_5: so iminā sīlasampannataroti vattuṃ mā labhatūti samārake sabrahmaketi visuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:942_6: Tathā samaṇā nāma ekanikāyādivasena bahussutā sīlavanto paṇḍitā,
atk-s0301a:942_8: te iminā sīlasampannatarāti vattuṃ mā labhantūti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:942_9: Sadevamanussāyāti idaṃ pana nippadesato dassanatthaṃ gahitameva gahetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:942_10: Apicettha purimāni tīṇi padāni lokavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0301a:942_15: Ettha ca sīlādayo cattāro dhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā,
atk-s0301a:943_1: “ayaṃ satthā avīcito yāva bhavaggā sīlādīhi attanā adhikataraṃ apassanto ‘mayā paṭividdhaṃ navalokuttaradhammameva
atk-s0301a:943_2: sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharissāmī’ti cinteti,
atk-s0301a:943_5: gacchāmissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti cintetvā purato pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0301a:944_0: Viharanti cāti ettha yo vadeyya “viharantīti vacanato paccuppannepi bahū buddhā”ti,
atk-s0301a:944_2: etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti iminā vacanena paṭibāhitabbo.
atk-s0301a:945_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0301a:947_0: Ādīhi cassa suttehi aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvo dīpetabbo.
atk-s0301a:947_1: Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi buddhā saddhammagaruno, tasmā.
atk-s0301a:949_8: Sammadevāti na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvitapakatā hutvā,
atk-s0301a:949_9: yathā vā tathā vā pabbajitāpi ye anulomapaṭipadaṃ pūrenti,
atk-s0301a:949_10: te sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti nāma.
atk-s0301a:949_13: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti sāmaṃ jānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a:950_2: na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0301a:950_5: Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti.
atk-s0301a:950_6: Sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0301a:950_8: “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto jānāti.
atk-s0301a:951_3: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0301a:951_8: imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a:951_9: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlako rukkho viyāti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0301a:952_3: Mātā panassa puttaṃ disvāva gharā nikkhamma pattaṃ gahetvā antonivesanaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0301a:953_0: Āhutiṃ niccaṃ paggaṇhātīti niccakāle āhutipiṇḍaṃ paggaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a:953_1: Taṃ divasaṃ pana tasmiṃ ghare bhūtabalikammaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:953_2: Sabbagehaṃ haritupalittaṃ vippakiṇṇalājaṃ vanamālaparikkhittaṃ ussitaddhajapaṭākaṃ tattha tattha puṇṇaghare
atk-s0301a:953_5: Sāpi brāhmaṇī kālasseva vuṭṭhāya soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkārena attabhāvaṃ alaṅkari.
atk-s0301a:953_8: “mahābrahmaṃ bhojessāmī”ti suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ pāyāsaṃ pūretvā sappimadhusakkharādīhi yojetvā nivesanassa
atk-s0301a:953_12: catūsu koṇesu majjhe ca ekekaṃ pāyāsapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0301a:953_14: yāva kapparā sappinā paggharantena pathaviyaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “bhuñjatu bhavaṃ mahābrahmā,
atk-s0301a:953_16: tappetu bhavaṃ mahābrahmā”ti vadamānā brahmānaṃ bhojeti.
atk-s0301a:954_0: Etadahosīti mahākhīṇāsavassa sīlagandhaṃ chadevaloke ajjhottharitvā brahmalokaṃ upagataṃ ghāyamānassa etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:954_3: ‘Ayaṃ hi evarūpaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguuḷuṅkamattampi adatvā,
atk-s0301a:954_4: “mahābrahmaṃ bhojessāmī”ti tulaṃ pahāya hatthena tulayantī viya,
atk-s0301a:954_6: aggiṃ pahāya khajjopanakaṃ dhamamānā viya bhūtabaliṃ kurumānā āhiṇḍati.
atk-s0301a:954_7: Gacchāmissā micchādassanaṃ bhinditvā apāyamaggato uddharitvā yathā asītikoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane vippakiritvā saggamaggaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0301a:955_0: Dūre itoti imamhā ṭhānā dūre brahmaloko.
atk-s0301a:955_1: Tato hi kūṭāgāramattā silā pātitā ekena ahorattena aṭṭhacattālīsayojanasahassāni khepayamānā catūhi māsehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhaheyya,
atk-s0301a:955_5: Brahmapathanti ettha brahmapatho nāma cattāri kusalajjhānāni,
atk-s0301a:955_7: taṃ brahmapathaṃ ajānantī tvaṃ kiṃ jappasi vippalapasi?
atk-s0301a:955_9: na etaṃ tiṇabījāni pakkhipitvā randhaṃ goyūsaṃ khādanti,
atk-s0301a:956_0: Evaṃ vatvā puna so mahābrahmā añjaliṃ paggayha avakujjo hutvā theraṃ upadisanto eso hi te brāhmaṇi brahmadevotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:956_2: Atidevapattoti devānaṃ atidevabhāvaṃ brahmānaṃ atibrahmabhāvaṃ patto.
atk-s0301a:956_3: Anaññaposīti ṭhapetvā imaṃ attabhāvaṃ aññassa attabhāvassa vā puttadārassa vā aposanatāya anaññaposī.
atk-s0301a:958_0: Na tassa pacchā na puratthamatthīti pacchā vuccati atītaṃ,
atk-s0301a:958_2: atītānāgatesu khandhesu chandarāgavirahitassa pacchā vā puratthaṃ vā natthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:958_6: kattaradaṇḍādīni gahetvā vicarantopi vadhakacetanāya abhāvā nikkhittadaṇḍo.
atk-s0301a:958_7: Tasathāvaresūti ettha pana puthujjanā tasā nāma,
atk-s0301a:958_9: Satta pana sekhā tasāti vattuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0301a:959_5: Ettakena kathāmaggena brahmā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento āyatane brāhmaṇiṃ niyojesi.
atk-s0301a:961_2: Idaṃ niccanti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ “nicca”nti vadati.
atk-s0301a:961_8: Idaṃ hi na jāyatītiādīsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā natthi,
atk-s0301a:961_10: Ito ca panaññanti ito sahakāyā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0301a:961_12: Evaṃvādī ca pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro magge cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0301a:962_1: heṭṭhupapattiko kiresa brahmā anuppanne buddhuppāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo
atk-s0301a:962_2: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vehapphalabrahmaloke pañcakappasatikaṃ
atk-s0301a:962_4: Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā heṭṭhupapattikaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhabrahmaloke catusaṭṭhikappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:962_5: Tattha dutiyajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassare aṭṭha kappe āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:962_8: So paṭhamakāle attanā katakammañca nibbattaṭṭhānañca aññāsi,
atk-s0301a:962_9: kāle pana gacchante gacchante ubhayaṃ pamussitvā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0301a:963_0: Avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto.
atk-s0301a:964_0: Evaṃ vutte so brahmā yathā nāma maggacoro dve tayo pahāre adhivāsento sahāye anācikkhitvāpi uttariṃ pahāraṃ
atk-s0301a:964_1: pahariyamāno “asuko ca asuko ca mayhaṃ sahāyo”ti ācikkhati,
atk-s0301a:964_3: “bhagavā mayhaṃ padānupadaṃ pekkhanto maṃ nippīḷitukāmo”ti bhīto attano sahāye ācikkhanto dvāsattatītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:964_6: mayaṃ dvāsattati janā puññakammā tena puññakammena idha nibbattā.
atk-s0301a:964_7: Vasavattino sayaṃ aññesaṃ vase avattitvā pare attano vase vattema,
atk-s0301a:964_9: ayaṃ no vedehi gatattā “vedagū”ti saṅkhaṃ gatā bhagavā antimā brahmupapatti.
atk-s0301a:964_10: Asmābhijappanti janā anekāti anekajanā amhe abhijappanti.
atk-s0301a:964_15: vasavattī, issaro, kattā, nimmātā, seṭṭho, sajitā, vasī,
atk-s0301a:965_0: Atha naṃ bhagavā appaṃ hi etantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:965_1: Tattha etanti yaṃ tvaṃ idha tava āyuṃ “dīgha”nti maññasi,
atk-s0301a:965_5: “idāni tava avasiṭṭhaṃ ettakaṃ āyū”ti ahaṃ jānāmi.
atk-s0301a:965_13: Yamahaṃ vijaññāti yaṃ ahaṃ tayā kathitaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:966_0: Idānissa ācikkhanto bhagavā yaṃ tvaṃ apāyesītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:966_2: pubbe kiresa kulaghare nibbattitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a:966_3: “jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānassa
atk-s0301a:966_4: lābhī hutvā gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a:966_5: Tadā ca kālenakālaṃ satthavāhā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi marukantāraṃ paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0301a:966_6: Marukantāre pana divā na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0301a:966_8: Atha purimasakaṭassa aggayuge yuttabalibaddā gacchantā gacchantā nivattitvā āgatamaggābhimukhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:966_9: sabbasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā aruṇe uggate nivattitabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu.
atk-s0301a:967_0: Tāpasopi kālasseva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisinno gaṅgaṃ olokayamāno addasa gaṅgaṃ mahatā
atk-s0301a:967_3: “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ loke evarūpassa madhurodakassa alābhena kilissamānā sattā”ti?
atk-s0301a:967_4: So evaṃ āvajjento marukantāre taṃ satthaṃ disvā ‘ime sattā mā nassantū’ti “ito cito ca mahāudakakkhandho
atk-s0301a:967_5: chijjitvā marukantāre satthābhimukho gacchatū”ti abhiññācittena adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:967_6: Saha cittuppādena mātikāruḷhaṃ viya udakaṃ tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:967_7: Manussā udakasaddena vuṭṭhāya udakaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nhāyitvā pivitvā goṇepi pāyetvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:967_8: Satthā taṃ brahmuno pubbakammaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:968_0: Aparasmimpi samaye tāpaso gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā araññagāmakaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0301a:968_1: Tena ca samayena corā taṃ gāmaṃ paharitvā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā gāviyo ca karamare ca gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:968_3: Tāpaso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kinnu kho eta”nti?
atk-s0301a:968_4: Āvajjento “manussānaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:968_5: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena corānaṃ paṭipathe caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0301a:968_12: Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:969_0: Puna ekasmiṃ samaye uparigaṅgāvāsikaṃ ekaṃ kulaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāvāsikena kulena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a:969_2: bahuṃ khādanīyañceva bhojanīyañca gandhamālādīni ca āropetvā gaṅgāsotena āgacchati.

atk-s0301a:974_1: bhagavato pabhassaraṃ pabhaṃ passasīti pucchati. Na me, mārisa,

atk-s0301a:984_1: Navame ābādhikoti “sāsapamattīhi pīḷakāhī”tiādinā nayena anantarasutte āgatena ābādhena ābādhiko.

atk-s0301a:984_12: Passa yāvañca teti passa yattakaṃ tayā aparaddhaṃ,

atk-s0301a:989_9: tasmiṃ janapade taṃ nagaraṃ patvā taṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.

atk-s0301a:990_8: Tepi bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna attano parisaṃ ādāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā

atk-s0301a:990_20: Ayameva kokāliko iminā ca kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti veditabbo.

atk-s0301a:991_7: Tattha mā hevanti mā evaṃ abhaṇi.

atk-s0301a:1013_9: Antarena yamakasālānanti mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā ṭhitasālānaṃ antarikāya.
atk-s0301a:1013_11: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma maraṇamañce nipanno mahaddhano kuṭumbiko puttānaṃ dhanasāraṃ ācikkheyya,
atk-s0301a:1013_12: evamevaṃ parinibbānamañce nipanno pañcacattālīsa vassāni dinnaṃ ovādaṃ sabbaṃ ekasmiṃ appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1013_13: Ayaṃ tathāgatassa pacchimā vācāti idaṃ pana saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1014_0: Ito paraṃ yaṃ parinibbānaparikammaṃ katvā bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0301a:1014_2: atha kho bhagavā paṭhamaṃ jhānantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1014_3: Tattha saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanne bhagavati assāsapassāsānaṃ appavattiṃ disvā,
atk-s0301a:1014_13: Thero kira satthārā saddhiṃyeva taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanto yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1014_16: antonirodhe ca kālaṃkiriyā nāma natthī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0301a:1015_0: Atha kho bhagavā saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajji…pe…
atk-s0301a:1015_1: tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjīti ettha pana bhagavā catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0301a:1015_4: pannarasasu ṭhānesu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0301a:1015_5: Dasasu asubhesu dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu mettākaruṇāmuditesu ānāpāne paricchedākāseti imesu tāva catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0301a:1015_6: Ṭhapetvā pana dvattiṃsākārañca dasa ca asubhāni sesesu terasasu dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ…
atk-s0301a:1015_8: Aṭṭhasu pana kasiṇesu upekkhābrahmavihāre ānāpāne paricchedākāse catūsu arūpesūti imesu pannarasasu ṭhānesu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0301a:1015_10: Nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto pana bhagavā dhammassāmi sabbāpi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo pavisitvā
atk-s0301a:1015_11: videsaṃ gacchanto ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā viya sabbasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavitvā paviṭṭho.
atk-s0301a:1016_0: Catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyīti ettha ca jhānasamanantaraṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaranti,
atk-s0301a:1016_2: Catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma,
atk-s0301a:1016_3: catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a:1016_5: Bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
atk-s0301a:1016_6: Ye hi keci buddhā vā paccekabuddhā vā ariyasāvakā vā antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya sabbe bhavaṅgacitteneva abyākatena dukkhasaccena kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a:1017_6: Tadāsīti “saha parinibbānā mahābhūmicālo ahosī”ti evaṃ mahāparinibbāne vuttaṃ bhūmicālaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a:1017_7: So hi lomahaṃsanako ca bhiṃsanako ca āsi.
atk-s0301a:1017_11: Santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya.
atk-s0301a:1017_16: na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito samparivatti.
atk-s0301a:1017_17: Vimokkhoti kenaci dhammena anāvaraṇavimokkho sabbaso apaññattibhāvūpagamo pajjotanibbānasadiso jātoti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1027_4: dhanañjānigottā matthakaṃ bhinditvā nikkhantāti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0301a:1027_6: So kira brāhmaṇo micchādiṭṭhiko “buddho dhammo saṅgho”ti vutte kaṇṇe pidahati,
atk-s0301a:1027_9: Brāhmaṇo dānaṃ dento pañcasatānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ appodakaṃ pāyāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0301a:1027_11: Brāhmaṇassa dānadivase brāhmaṇī tassa vasavattitāya pahīnamaccheratāya ca sahatthā parivisati.
atk-s0301a:1027_12: Brāhmaṇiyā pana dānadivase brāhmaṇo pātova gharā nikkhamitvā palāyati.
atk-s0301a:1027_13: Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ asammantetvā pañcasate brāhmaṇe nimantetvā brāhmaṇiṃ āha –
atk-s0301a:1027_14: “sve bhoti amhākaṃ ghare pañcasatā brāhmaṇā bhuñjissantī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1027_18: Yaṃ pana tvaṃ ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi khipitvāpi ukkāsitvāpi “namo buddhassā”ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a:1027_20: Taṃ hi sutvā brāhmaṇā anattamanā honti,
atk-s0301a:1027_22: Tvaṃ brāhmaṇehi vā bhijja devehi vā,
atk-s0301a:1027_23: ahaṃ pana satthāraṃ anussaritvā na sakkomi anamassamānā saṇṭhātunti.
atk-s0301a:1027_24: Bhoti kulasatike gāme gāmadvārampi tāva pidahituṃ vāyamanti,
atk-s0301a:1027_25: tvaṃ dvīhaṅgulehi pidahitabbaṃ mukhaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ bhojanakālamattaṃ pidahituṃ na sakkosīti.
atk-s0301a:1027_26: Evaṃ punappunaṃ kathetvāpi so nivāretuṃ asakkonto ussīsake ṭhapitaṃ maṇḍalaggakhaggaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0301a:1027_27: “bhoti sace sve brāhmaṇesu nisinnesu taṃ muṇḍasamaṇakaṃ namassasi,
atk-s0301a:1027_28: iminā taṃ khaggena pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesamatthakā kaḷīraṃ viya koṭṭetvā rāsiṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0301a:1029_0: Kaḷīramiva chejjāmi, yadi micchaṃ na kāhasi.
atk-s0301a:1031_0: Sace saṅghoti kittesi, jīvantī me nivesane”ti.
atk-s0301a:1032_0: Ariyasāvikā pana pathavī viya duppakampā, sineru viya dupparivattiyā. Sā tena naṃ evamāha –
atk-s0301a:1036_0: Dhītāhaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassa, chinda vā maṃ vadhassu vā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1037_0: Evaṃ dhanañjānigajjitaṃ nāma gajjantī pañca gāthāsatāni abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1037_1: Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ parāmasituṃ vā paharituṃ vā asakkonto “bhoti yaṃ te ruccati,
atk-s0301a:1037_2: taṃ karohī”ti vatvā khaggaṃ sayane khipi.
atk-s0301a:1037_3: Punadivase gehaṃ haritupalittaṃ kārāpetvā lājāpuṇṇaghaṭamālāgandhādīhi tattha tattha alaṅkārāpetvā pañcannaṃ
atk-s0301a:1037_4: brāhmaṇasatānaṃ navasappisakkharamadhuyuttaṃ appodakapāyāsaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1038_0: Brāhmaṇīpi pātova gandhodakena sayaṃ nhāyitvā sahassagghanakaṃ ahatavatthaṃ nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ
atk-s0301a:1038_1: ekaṃsaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā bhattagge brāhmaṇe parivisamānā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0301a:1038_2: ekapantiyaṃ nisinnassa tassa brāhmaṇassa bhattaṃ upasaṃharantī dunnikkhitte dārubhaṇḍe pakkhali.
atk-s0301a:1038_5: Satisampannatāya pana pāyāsapātiṃ achaḍḍetvā saṇikaṃ otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ saṇṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ brāhmaṇasatānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1038_6: majjhe sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā yena veḷuvanaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1039_0: Tasmiñca samaye tesu brāhmaṇesu keci bhuttā honti,
atk-s0301a:1039_4: Te taṃ saddaṃ sutvāva sinerumattena muggarena sīse pahaṭā viya kaṇṇesu sūlena viddhā viya dukkhadomanassaṃ
atk-s0301a:1039_5: paṭisaṃvediyamānā “iminā aññaladdhikena mayaṃ gharaṃ pavesitā”ti kujjhitvā hatthe piṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā mukhena
atk-s0301a:1039_6: gahitaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā dhanuṃ disvā kākā viya brāhmaṇaṃ akkosamānā disāvidisā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1039_7: Brāhmaṇo evaṃ bhijjitvā gacchante brāhmaṇe disvā brāhmaṇiṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya oloketvā,
atk-s0301a:1039_8: “idameva bhayaṃ sampassamānā mayaṃ hiyyo paṭṭhāya bhotiṃ yācantā na labhimhā”ti nānappakārehi brāhmaṇiṃ akkositvā,
atk-s0301a:1040_1: na sakkā gantvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā santajjetuṃ,
atk-s0301a:1040_2: ekameva naṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti gacchantova “kiṃsu chetvā”ti gāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā –
atk-s0301a:1040_10: atha naṃ ‘tvaṃ rāgādīnampi vadhaṃ na icchasi.
atk-s0301a:1040_13: Iti imaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ samaṇo gotamo neva gilituṃ na uggilituṃ sakkhissatī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:1040_14: Sammodīti attano paṇḍitatāya kuddhabhāvaṃ adassetvā madhurakathaṃ kathento sammodi.
atk-s0301a:1042_2: pañcamattehi pana gāthā satehi tathāgataṃ akkosanto āgatoti.
atk-s0301a:1042_4: Kupito anattamanoti “samaṇena gotamena mayhaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātaraṃ pabbājentena jāni katā,
atk-s0301a:1042_5: pakkho bhinno”ti kodhena kupito domanassena ca anattamano hutvāti attho.
atk-s0301a:1042_6: Akkosatīti “corosi, bālosi, mūḷhosi, thenosi, oṭṭhosi, meṇḍosi, goṇosi,
atk-s0301a:1042_12: idāni te rājakulaṃ gantvā daṇḍaṃ āropessāmī”tiādīni vadanto paribhāsati nāma.
atk-s0301a:1043_7: “Isayo nāma kupitā sapanaṃ denti kisavacchādayo viyā”ti anussavavasena “sapati maṃ maññe samaṇo gotamo”ti bhayaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0301a:1044_2: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tasseva puggalassa tena kodhena pāpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1044_3: Sato upasammatīti satiyā samannāgato hutvā adhivāseti.
atk-s0301a:1044_12: Akovidāti tasmiṃ dhamme akusalā andhabālaputhujjanā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1046_3: Jayañcevassa taṃ hotīti asseva taṃ jayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1046_6: Yā titikkhā vijānato adhivāsanāya guṇaṃ vijānantassa titikkhā adhivāsanā,
atk-s0301a:1046_8: Bālo pana pharusaṃ bhaṇanto “mayhaṃ jayo”ti kevalaṃ jayaṃ maññati. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1048_2: nānappakāraṃ pana suddhañca sambhārayuttañca kañjikaṃ kāretvā vikkiṇāpento bahudhanaṃ saṅkharīti “bilaṅgikabhāradvājo”ti
atk-s0301a:1048_4: Tuṇhībhūtoti “tayo me jeṭṭhakabhātaro iminā pabbājitā”ti ativiya kuddho kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1050_7: iti me bhavaṃ gotamo jānātūti āha.
atk-s0301a:1050_10: Na hiṃsatīti na viheṭheti na dukkhāpeti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1052_2: jaṭāpañhassa pana pucchitattā saṅgītikārehi evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0301a:1054_2: suddhikapañhassa pana pucchitattā saṅgītikārehi evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0301a:1054_6: So sujjhati na aññā itarā pajāti so tevijjo brāhmaṇo sujjhati,
atk-s0301a:1054_7: ayaṃ pana aññā nāmikā pajā na sujjhatīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1054_8: Bahumpi palapaṃ jappanti bahumpi palapaṃ jappanto,
atk-s0301a:1056_2: aggi paricaraṇavasena panassa saṅgītikārehi etaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1056_5: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1056_6: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ aggapāyāsaṃ gahetvā ‘mahābrahmānaṃ bhojemī’ti aggimhi jhāpento aphalaṃ karoti apāyamaggaṃ okkamati,
atk-s0301a:1056_9: micchādiṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā pabbājetvā cattāro magge ceva cattāri ca phalāni demī”ti,
atk-s0301a:1056_10: tasmā pubbaṇhasamaye rājagahaṃ pavisitvā tattha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1057_1: Jātimāti yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā parisuddhāya jātiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0301a:1057_2: Sutavā bahūti bahu nānappakāre ganthe sutavā.
atk-s0301a:1057_3: Somaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so tevijjo brāhmaṇo imaṃ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjituṃ yutto,
atk-s0301a:1058_1: Saggāpāyanti dibbena cakkhunā saggampi apāyampi passati.
atk-s0301a:1058_4: Brāhmaṇo bhavanti avīcito yāva bhavaggā bhotā gotamena sadiso jātisampanno khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo natthi,
atk-s0301a:1059_0: Evañca pana vatvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ pūretvā dasabalassa pāyāsaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0301a:1059_1: Satthā uppattiṃ dīpetvā bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipanto gāthābhigītaṃ metiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1059_5: mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhikkhācāravattena ṭhitassa kaṭacchumattampi dātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0301a:1059_6: idāni pana mayā tuyhaṃ kilañjamhi tile vitthārentena viya sabbe buddhaguṇā pakāsitā,
atk-s0301a:1059_7: iti gāyanena gāyitvā laddhaṃ viya idaṃ bhojanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1059_11: atthañca dhammañca sampassantānaṃ “evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti esa dhammo na hoti.
atk-s0301a:1059_16: dhamme sati dhammaṃ apekkhitvā dhamme patiṭṭhāya jīvitaṃ kappentānaṃ esā vutti ayaṃ ājīvo –
atk-s0301a:1060_1: ahaṃ pubbe samaṇassa gotamassa guṇe vā aguṇe vā na jānāmi.
atk-s0301a:1060_2: Idāni panassāhaṃ guṇe ñatvā mama gehe asītikoṭimattaṃ dhanaṃ sāsane vippakiritukāmo jāto,
atk-s0301a:1060_5: Atha bhagavā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pesetvā tassa cittācāraṃ vīmaṃsanto,
atk-s0301a:1060_7: Yaṃ hi bhojanaṃ ārabbha kathā uppannā,
atk-s0301a:1060_9: sesā niddosā”ti brāhmaṇassa catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ dānadvāraṃ dassento aññena cātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1060_13: aññehi tayā “pariccajissāmī”ti sallakkhitehi cīvarādīhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahassu.
atk-s0301a:1060_14: Khettaṃ hi taṃ puññapekkhassa hotīti etaṃ tathāgatasāsanaṃ nāma puññapekkhassa puññatthikassa tuyhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1060_15: appepi bīje bahusassaphaladāyakaṃ sukhettaṃ viya paṭiyattaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1062_1: Navame sundarikabhāradvājoti sundarikāya nadiyā tīre aggijuhaṇena evaṃladdhanāmo.
atk-s0301a:1062_5: Ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so kira brāhmaṇo aggimhi hutāvasesaṃ pāyāsaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1062_8: taṃ yadi brahmuno mukhato jātassa brāhmaṇassa dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1062_9: evaṃ me pitarā saha puttopi santappito bhaveyya,
atk-s0301a:1062_11: So brāhmaṇassa dassanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā catuddisā anuvilokesi,
atk-s0301a:1063_1: Sasīsaṃ pārutaṃ nisinnanti saha sīsena pārutakāyaṃ nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1063_3: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1063_4: ayaṃ brāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ aggapāyāsaṃ gahetvā “mahābrahmānaṃ bhojemī”ti aggimhi jhāpento aphalaṃ karoti…pe…
atk-s0301a:1063_5: cattāro magge ceva cattāri ca phalāni demīti.
atk-s0301a:1063_6: Tasmā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya gantvā vuttanayena tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1063_15: atha maṃ so disvā kathaṃ pavattessati,
atk-s0301a:1063_16: tassāhaṃ kathānusārena dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti kathāpavattanatthaṃ evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a:1064_2: Imassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā imaṃ habyasesaṃ dassāmī”ti,
atk-s0301a:1064_5: muṇḍako ayaṃ bhavanti sīse vivaritamatte nīcakesantaṃ disvā “muṇḍo”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:1064_6: Tato suṭṭhutaraṃ olokento pavattamattampi sikhaṃ adisvā hīḷento “muṇḍako”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:1064_9: Muṇḍāpi hīti kenaci kāraṇena muṇḍitasīsāpi honti.
atk-s0301a:1065_0: Mā jātiṃ pucchāti yadi dānassa mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsasi,
atk-s0301a:1065_3: Caraṇañca pucchāti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ puccha.
atk-s0301a:1065_5: Idānissa tamatthaṃ vibhāvento kaṭṭhā have jāyati jātavedotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1065_8: na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jātova aggikiccaṃ karoti, sāpāna-
atk-s0301a:1065_10: attano pana acciyādiguṇasampattiyā yato vā tato vā jāto karotiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1065_11: Evaṃ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jātova dakkhiṇeyyo hoti,
atk-s0301a:1065_15: Imāya dhitihiripamokkhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
atk-s0301a:1066_3: catūhi vā maggavedehi kilesānaṃ antaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:1066_15: So juhati dakkhiṇeyyeti yo evaṃ kāle khīṇāsavaṃ āmantetvā tattha catupaccayadakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a:1067_0: Iti brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathaṃ suṇanto pasīditvā idāni attano pasādaṃ āvikaronto addhā suyiṭṭhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1067_2: addhā mama yidaṃ idāni suyiṭṭhañca suhutañca bhavissati,
atk-s0301a:1067_3: pubbe pana aggimhi jhāpitaṃ niratthakaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0301a:1068_2: Tasmiṃ kira bhojane upahaṭamatteva “satthā bhuñjissatī”ti saññāya catūsu mahādīpesu dvīsu parittadīpasahassesu
atk-s0301a:1068_3: devatā pupphaphalādīni ceva sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādīni ca ādāya madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā madhuṃ gaṇhantiyo
atk-s0301a:1068_6: manussānañca oḷārikaṃ vatthūti tesaṃ tāva oḷārikavatthutāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1068_7: Goyūse pana tilabījāni pakkhipitvā pakkattā oḷārikamissakaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1068_8: devānañca sukhumaṃ vatthūti tesaṃ sukhumavatthutāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1069_7: Appāṇaketi sappāṇakasmiṃ hi parittake udake pakkhitte pāṇakā maranti,
atk-s0301a:1069_17: Ayaṃ hi brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyāsaṃ opilāpetvā ummaggaṃ āruyha satthu santikaṃ anāgantvāva gaccheyya,
atk-s0301a:1069_20: Athassāhaṃ dhammadesanāya micchādiṭṭhigahaṇaṃ bhinditvā sāsane otāretvā amatapānaṃ pāyessāmī”ti adhiṭṭhānabalena evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a:1070_1: Bahiddhā hi etanti etaṃ dārujjhāpanaṃ nāma ariyadhammato bahiddhā.
atk-s0301a:1070_6: Ajjhattamevujjalayāmi jotinti niyakajjhatte attano santānasmiṃyeva ñāṇajotiṃ jālemi.
atk-s0301a:1070_9: Brahmacariyaṃ carāmīti bodhimaṇḍe caritaṃ brahmacariyaṃ gahetvā evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0301a:1071_1: khāribhāroti yathā khāribhāro khandhena vayhamāno upari ṭhitopi akkantakkantaṭṭhāne pathaviyā saddhiṃ phuseti,
atk-s0301a:1071_2: evameva jātigottakulādīni mānavatthūni nissāya ussāpito mānopi tattha tattha issaṃ uppādento catūsu apāyesu saṃsīdāpeti.
atk-s0301a:1071_5: Kodho dhūmoti tava ñāṇaggissa upakkilesaṭṭhena kodho dhumo.
atk-s0301a:1071_6: Tena hi te upakkiliṭṭho ñāṇaggi na virocati.
atk-s0301a:1071_7: Bhasmani mosavajjanti nirojaṭṭhena musāvādo chārikā nāma.
atk-s0301a:1071_8: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno aggi na joteti,
atk-s0301a:1071_9: evaṃ te musāvādena paṭicchannaṃ ñāṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1071_10: Jivhā sujāti yathā tuyhaṃ suvaṇṇarajatalohakaṭṭhamattikāsu aññataramayā yāgayajanatthāya sujā hoti,
atk-s0301a:1071_11: evaṃ mayhaṃ dhammayāgaṃ yajanatthāya pahūtajivhā sujāti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1071_12: Hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānanti yathā tuyhaṃ nadītīre jotiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1071_13: evaṃ mayhaṃ dhammayāgassa yajanaṭṭhānatthena sattānaṃ hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1072_0: Dhammo rahadoti yathā tvaṃ aggiṃ paricaritvā dhūmachārikasedakiliṭṭhasarīro sundarikaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā nhāyasi,
atk-s0301a:1072_1: evaṃ mayhaṃ sundarikāsadisena bāhirena rahadena attho natthi,
atk-s0301a:1072_3: tatrāhaṃ pāṇasatampi pāṇasahassampi caturāsītipāṇasahassānipi ekappahārena nhāpemi.
atk-s0301a:1072_4: Sīlatitthoti tassa pana me dhammarahadassa catupārisuddhisīlaṃ titthanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1072_5: Anāviloti yathā tuyhaṃ sundarikā nadī catūhi pañcahi ekato nhāyantehi heṭṭhupariyavālikā āluḷā hoti,
atk-s0301a:1072_7: anekasatasahassesupi pāṇesu otaritvā nhāyantesu so anāvilo vippasannova hoti.
atk-s0301a:1072_8: Sabbhi sataṃ pasatthoti paṇḍitehi paṇḍitānaṃ pasaṭṭho.
atk-s0301a:1073_0: Idāni ariyamaggarahadassa aṅgāni uddharitvā dassento saccaṃ dhammotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1073_8: Sammādiṭṭhiyā pana gahitāya taggatikattā sammāsaṅkappo gahitova hoti.
atk-s0301a:1073_14: Dhammotipadena diṭṭhi saṅkappo vāyāmo sati samādhīti pañcaṅgāni gahitāni.
atk-s0301a:1073_18: Majjhe sitāti sassatucchede vajjetvā majjhe nissitā.
atk-s0301a:1073_20: Sa tujjubhūtesu namo karohīti ettha ta-
atk-s0301a:1073_22: sa tvaṃ ujubhūtesu khīṇāsavesu namo karohīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1073_23: Tamahaṃ naraṃ dhammasārīti brūmīti yo evaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0301a:1073_24: tamahaṃ puggalaṃ “dhammasārī eso dhammasāriyā paṭicchanno”ti ca “kusaladhammehi akusaladhamme sāretvā ṭhito”ti vāti vadāmīti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1075_1: Dasame aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍeti paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa brāhmaṇassa arahattassa upanissayaṃ
atk-s0301a:1075_2: disvā “gacchāmissa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti gantvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0301a:1075_3: Naṭṭhā hontīti kasitvā vissaṭṭhā aṭavimukhā caramānā brāhmaṇe bhuñjituṃ gate palātā honti.
atk-s0301a:1075_6: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0301a:1075_8: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-s0301a:1075_11: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0301a:1075_16: Tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a:1075_19: Evaṃ nisīdanto ca pana chabbaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1076_0: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissantīti ajja chadivasamattakā paṭṭhāya na dissanti.
atk-s0301a:1076_2: Tena kira tilakhette vapite tadaheva devo vassitvā tile paṃsumhi osīdāpesi,
atk-s0301a:1076_3: pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā gahetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1076_5: tesaṃ upari pāṇakā patitvā paṇṇāni khādiṃsu,
atk-s0301a:1076_7: Brāhmaṇo khettaṃ oloketuṃ gato te disvā –
atk-s0301a:1077_0: Ussoḷhikāyāti ussāhena kaṇṇanaṅguṭṭhādīni ukkhipitvā vicarantā uppatanti.
atk-s0301a:1077_1: Tassa kira anupubbena bhogesu parikkhīṇesu pakkhipitabbassa abhāvena tucchakoṭṭhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1077_2: Tassa ito cito ca sattahi gharehi āgatā mūsikā te tucchakoṭṭhe pavisitvā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷantā viya naccanti,
atk-s0301a:1078_1: Tassa kira brāhmaṇassa sayanatthāya santhataṃ tiṇapaṇṇasanthāraṃ koci antarantarā paṭijagganto natthi.
atk-s0301a:1078_2: So divasaṃ araññe kammaṃ katvā sāyaṃ āgantvā tasmiṃ nipajjati.
atk-s0301a:1078_3: Athassa uppāṭakapāṇakā sarīraṃ ekacchannaṃ karontā khādanti,
atk-s0301a:1079_1: Yāva kira tassa brāhmaṇassa gehe vibhavamattā ahosi,
atk-s0301a:1079_2: tāva tā vidhavāpi hutvā patikulesu vasituṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1079_4: tadā tā “pitugharaṃ gacchathā”ti sassusasurādīhi nikkaḍḍhitā tato tasseva gharaṃ āgantvā vasantiyo brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0301a:1079_5: bhojanakāle “gacchatha ayyakena saddhiṃ bhuñjathā”ti putte pesenti,
atk-s0301a:1079_6: tehi pātiyaṃ hatthesu otāritesu brāhmaṇo hatthassa okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0301a:1080_2: Sottaṃ pādena bodhetīti niddaṃ okkantaṃ pādena paharitvā pabodheti.
atk-s0301a:1080_3: Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo mūsikasaddena ubbāḷho uppāṭakehi ca khajjamāno sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ alabhitvā paccūsakāle niddāyati.
atk-s0301a:1080_6: pacchā ca pubbe ca gahitassa iṇassa?
atk-s0301a:1080_10: gaccha kammaṃ karohī”ti pādena paharitvā pabodheti.
atk-s0301a:1081_0: Iṇāyikāti yesaṃ anena hatthato iṇaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1081_1: So kira kassaci hatthato ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ kassaci dve kassaci dasa…pe…
atk-s0301a:1081_2: kassaci satanti evaṃ bahūnaṃ hatthato iṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0301a:1081_3: Te divā brāhmaṇaṃ apassantā “gehato taṃ nikkhantameva gaṇhissāmā”ti balavapaccūse gantvā codenti.
atk-s0301a:1082_0: Bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena imāhi sattahi gāthāhi dukkhe kathite “yaṃ yaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a:1082_2: sabbametaṃ mayhaṃ natthī”ti dassento paṭigāthāhi brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0301a:1082_3: Brāhmaṇo tā gāthā sutvā bhagavati pasanno saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a:1082_4: Taṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vutte bhāradvājagottotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1083_0: Tañca pana brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā pabbājetvā ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā punadivase tena therena pacchāsamaṇena kosalarañño gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1083_1: Rājā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā pāsādā oruyha vanditvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā tathāgataṃ uparipāsādaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0301a:1083_2: varāsane nisīdāpetvā gandhodakena pāde dhovitvā satapākatelena makkhetvā yāguṃ āharāpetvā rajatadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0301a:1083_5: Rājā tathāgatassa pādesu patitvā, “sace me, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1083_13: paṭibalo ahaṃ palibodhaṃ dātuṃ, gaṇhatha, bhanteti.
atk-s0301a:1083_15: Mahallakattheropi dīgharattaṃ chāto yāvadatthaṃ yāguṃ pivi.
atk-s0301a:1083_16: Rājā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha –
atk-s0301a:1083_17: “bhagavā tumhe paveṇiyā āgate okkākavaṃse uppajjitvā cakkavattisiriṃ pahāya pabbajitvā loke aggataṃ patto, ko nāma, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1084_5: Rañño “ekaṃ dve sataṃ sahassa”nti gaṇentassa aṅguliyo nappahonti.
atk-s0301a:1084_7: nagare bheriṃ carāpehi ‘sabbe bahudhītikabrāhmaṇassa iṇāyikā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatantū”ti.
atk-s0301a:1084_9: Rājā tesaṃ hatthato paṇṇāni āharāpetvā sabbesaṃ anūnaṃ dhanamadāsi.
atk-s0301a:1084_16: etā pana satta dārikā mahāpalibodhā mayhanti.
atk-s0301a:1084_17: Rājā yānāni pesetvā tassa dhītaro āharāpetvā attano dhītaro katvā taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvā, “aññopi, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1084_25: mama santakaṃ tumhākaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti āha. Āma,
atk-s0301a:1084_28: cīvarapiṇḍapātādayopi sabbe paccayā amhākaṃ santakā bhavissanti.
atk-s0301a:1084_29: Tumhe tathāgatassa manaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1084_30: Thero tatheva appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karonto nacirasseva āsavakkhayaṃ pattoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1088_2: Dakkhiṇāgirisminti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitassa girino dakkhiṇabhāge janapado atthi,
atk-s0301a:1088_5: Ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāmeti ekanāḷāti tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1089_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadharaṭṭhe ekanāḷaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ upanissāya dakkhiṇagirimahāvihāre
atk-s0301a:1089_3: Kasibhāradvājassāti so brāhmaṇo kasiṃ nissāya jīvati,
atk-s0301a:1089_8: balībaddānaṃ khandhesu ṭhapetvā yuge yottehi yojitānīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1090_8: sabbe setamālāhi ceva gandhapañcaṅgulīhi ca alaṅkatā paripuṇṇapañcaṅgā sabbalakkhaṇasampannā,
atk-s0301a:1090_13: Evaṃ pañcasatā kassakā sabbe ahatasetavatthā gandhamālālaṅkatā dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭesu patiṭṭhitapupphacumbaṭakā
atk-s0301a:1090_14: haritālamanosilālañjanujjalagattā dasa dasa naṅgalā ekekagumbā hutvā gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1090_15: Naṅgalānaṃ sīsañca yugañca patodā ca suvaṇṇakhacitā.
atk-s0301a:1091_0: Brāhmaṇo pana pageva massukammaṃ kārāpetvā nhāyitvā sugandhagandhehi vilitto pañcasatagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:1091_1: nivāsetvā sahassagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā ekekissā aṅguliyā dve dveti vīsati aṅgulimuddikāyo kaṇṇesu
atk-s0301a:1091_2: sīhakuṇḍalāni sīse brahmaveṭhanaṃ paṭimuñcitvā suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaṇṭhe katvā brāhmaṇagaṇaparivuto kammantaṃ vosāsati.
atk-s0301a:1091_3: Athassa brāhmaṇī anekasatabhājanesu pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā mahāsakaṭesu āropetvā gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
atk-s0301a:1091_5: Gehampissa haritupalittaṃ vippakiṇṇalājaṃ puṇṇaghaṭakadalidhajapaṭākāhi alaṅkataṃ gandhapupphādīhi sukatabalikammaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1091_6: khettañca tesu tesu ṭhānesu samussitaddhajapaṭākaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1092_0: Atha brāhmaṇo suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovāpetvā pāyāsassa pūretvā sappimadhuphāṇitehi abhisaṅkharitvā naṅgalabalikammaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1092_1: Brāhmaṇī pañcannaṃ kassakasatānaṃ suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambalohamayāni bhājanāni dāpetvā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1092_2: Brāhmaṇo pana balikammaṃ kāretvā rattabandhikāyo upāhanāyo ārohitvā rattasuvaṇṇadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0301a:1093_0: Vihāre pana yattha yattha buddhā vasanti,
atk-s0301a:1093_1: tattha tattha nesaṃ devasikaṃ pañca kiccāni bhavanti,
atk-s0301a:1094_1: bhagavā hi pātova uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādiparikammaṃ katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0301a:1094_2: tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā bhikkhācāravelāya nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya
atk-s0301a:1094_3: kadāci ekako kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati kadāci pakatiyā,
atk-s0301a:1094_6: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatiyo vātā pathaviṃ sodhenti,
atk-s0301a:1094_7: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0301a:1094_8: apare vātā pupphāni upaharitvā magge okiranti.
atk-s0301a:1094_13: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasasiñcanāni
atk-s0301a:1094_14: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni karontiyo ito cito ca vidhāvanti.
atk-s0301a:1094_15: Hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0301a:1094_16: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni.
atk-s0301a:1094_17: Tena saññāṇena manussā jānanti “ajja bhagavā idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0301a:1094_18: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1094_21: amhākaṃ bhikkhusataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti.
atk-s0301a:1095_0: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ santānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0301a:1095_5: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1095_6: Tattha gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0301a:1095_7: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0301a:1096_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0301a:1096_9: Bhagavā tesaṃ attano cariyānurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ deti.
atk-s0301a:1096_10: Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti,
atk-s0301a:1096_16: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0301a:1096_17: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a:1096_18: Atha samassāsitakāyo uṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0301a:1096_19: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0301a:1096_20: tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0301a:1096_21: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1097_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0301a:1097_1: buddhāsanā vuṭṭhāya nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gāhāpeti.
atk-s0301a:1097_2: Upaṭṭhākopi buddhāsanaṃ ānetvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññāpeti.
atk-s0301a:1097_3: Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā tattha āgantvā nisīdati ekakova muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno.
atk-s0301a:1097_4: Atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1097_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a:1098_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkamantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0301a:1098_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso caturakkharampi.
atk-s0301a:1098_2: Bhagavā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a:1099_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāpīḷitassa sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a:1099_1: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a:1099_2: Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ oloketi.
atk-s0301a:1100_0: Tadāpi evaṃ olokento kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a:1100_2: kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā eso brāhmaṇo saputtadāro tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya asītikoṭidhanaṃ mama
atk-s0301a:1100_3: sāsane vippakiritvā aparabhāge nikkhamma pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā tattha gantvā kathaṃ
atk-s0301a:1100_5: Etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1101_7: Bhagavato kira piṇḍāya pavisitukāmassa bhamaro viya vikasitapadumadvayamajjhaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1101_9: Taṃ evamāgataṃ pattaṃ hatthehi sampaṭicchitvā cīvarañca parimaṇḍalaṃ pārutaṃ kāyena dhāretvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1101_13: Yadā hi bhagavā ekakova katthaci gantukāmo hoti,
atk-s0301a:1101_14: yāva bhikkhācāravelā dvāraṃ pidahitvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0301a:1101_15: Bhikkhū tāya saññāya jānanti “ajja bhagavā ekakova piṇḍāya caritukāmo,
atk-s0301a:1101_17: Te attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1102_0: Parivesanā vattatīti tesaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanādīni gahetvā nisinnānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ kassakānaṃ parivisanā vippakatā hoti.
atk-s0301a:1102_1: Ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti yattha ṭhitaṃ brāhmaṇo passati,
atk-s0301a:1102_3: Ṭhatvā ca rajatasuvaṇṇarasapiñjaraṃ candimasūriyānaṃ pabhaṃ atirocamānaṃ samantato sarīrappabhaṃ muñci,
atk-s0301a:1102_4: yāya ajjhotthaṭattā brāhmaṇassa kammantasālābhittirukkhakasitamattikapiṇḍādayo suvaṇṇamayā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1102_5: Atha manussā bhuñjantā ca kasantā ca sabbakiccāni pahāya asītianubyañjanaparivāraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0301a:1102_6: sarīraṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepavibhūsitaṃ bāhuyugalaṃ jaṅgamaṃ viya padumasaraṃ,
atk-s0301a:1102_8: vijjulatāvinaddhamiva ca kanakasikharaṃ siriyā jalamānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā hatthapāde
atk-s0301a:1102_10: Evaṃ tehi samparivāritaṃ addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1102_11: disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ahaṃ kho, samaṇa,
atk-s0301a:1103_1: kiṃ samantapāsādike pasādanīye uttamadamathasamathamanuppattepi tathāgate appasādena,
atk-s0301a:1103_2: udāhu aḍḍhatiyānaṃ janasahassānaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetvāpi kaṭacchubhikkhāya maccherenāti?
atk-s0301a:1103_4: bhagavato panassa dassanena atittaṃ nikkhittakammantaṃ janaṃ disvā “kammabhaṅgaṃ me kātuṃ āgato”ti anattamanatā ahosi,
atk-s0301a:1103_8: sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ sīse cūḷāmaṇi viya abhavissa,
atk-s0301a:1103_10: evamevaṃ alasatāya kammante appayojetvā vappamaṅgalādīsu piṇḍāya caratī”tipissa anattamanatā ahosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a:1104_2: na camhi yathā tvaṃ evaṃ lakkhaṇasampanno,
atk-s0301a:1104_3: tvampi kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassu,
atk-s0301a:1104_4: ko te attho na sampajjeyya evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannassāti.
atk-s0301a:1104_8: Tasmā idāni “ayaṃ so”ti ñatvā “cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya kilantosī”ti upārambhaṃ āropento evamāha.
atk-s0301a:1104_11: bhagavato pana rūpasampattiṃ disvā puññasampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno kathāpavattanatthampi evamāha.
atk-s0301a:1104_12: Atha bhagavā veneyyavasena sadevake loke aggakassakavappakabhāvaṃ attano dassento ahampi kho brāhmaṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1105_1: “ayaṃ samaṇo” ‘ahampi kasāmi ca vapāmi cā’ti bhaṇati.
atk-s0301a:1105_2: Na cassa oḷārikāni yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni passāmi,
atk-s0301a:1105_4: Bhagavantaṃ pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggā olokayamāno,
atk-s0301a:1105_6: “aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ evarūpo musā bhaṇeyyā”ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavati samaṇavādaṃ pahāya gottena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0301a:1105_7: samudācaramāno na kho pana mayaṃ passāma bhoto gotamassātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1105_8: Bhagavā pana yasmā pubbadhammasabhāgatāya kathanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0301a:1106_1: Nanu brāhmaṇena bhagavā naṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ puṭṭho apucchitassa bījassa sabhāgatāya āha “saddhā bīja”nti,
atk-s0301a:1106_3: Na hi buddhānaṃ ananusandhikakathā nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a:1106_6: brāhmaṇena hi bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhāravasena kasiṃ pucchito.
atk-s0301a:1106_7: So tassa anukampāya “idaṃ apucchita”nti aparihāpetvā samūlaṃ saupakāraṃ sasambhāraṃ saphalaṃ kasiṃ paññāpetuṃ
atk-s0301a:1106_13: Bīje hi sati kasiṃ karonti, na asati.
atk-s0301a:1106_14: Bījappamāṇena ca kusalā kassakā khettaṃ kasanti,
atk-s0301a:1106_16: na adhikaṃ “mā no mogho vāyāmo ahosī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1106_18: tasmā bhagavā mūlato paṭṭhāya kasisambhāraṃ dassento tassa brāhmaṇassa kasiyā pubbadhammassa bījassa
atk-s0301a:1106_19: sabhāgatāya attano kasiyā pubbadhammaṃ dassento āha “saddhā bīja”nti.
atk-s0301a:1107_0: Pucchitaṃyeva vatvā apucchitaṃ pacchā kiṃ na vuttanti ce?
atk-s0301a:1107_4: saddhārahito ca paññavā paresaṃ saddhāya attano avisaye apaṭipajjamāno visesaṃ nādhigacchati,
atk-s0301a:1107_5: kilesakālussiyaparāmaṭṭhāpi cassa dubbalā saddhā balavatiyā paññāya sahasā vattamānā atthasiddhiṃ na karoti hatthinā saddhiṃ ekadhure yutto goṇo viya.
atk-s0301a:1107_6: Itissa saddhā upakārikāti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saddhāya patiṭṭhāpentena pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho desanākusalatāya pubbe vutto.
atk-s0301a:1107_10: añño ca evarūpo īsāyottādi pubbe vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:1108_2: Bījanti pañcavidhaṃ bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phalubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījameva pañcamanti.
atk-s0301a:1108_3: Taṃ sabbampi viruhaṇaṭṭhena bījanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1109_0: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa kasiyā mūlabhūtaṃ bījaṃ dve kiccāni karoti,
atk-s0301a:1109_3: evaṃ bhagavato kasiyā mūlabhūtā saddhā heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0301a:1109_5: Yathā ca taṃ mūlena pathavirasaṃ āporasaṃ gahetvā nāḷena dhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0301a:1109_6: evamayaṃ sīlamūlena samathavipassanārasaṃ gahetvā ariyamagganāḷena ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0301a:1109_7: Yathā ca taṃ subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mūlaṅkurapaṇṇanāḷakaṇḍapasavehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā
atk-s0301a:1109_9: evamesā cittasantāne patiṭṭhahitvā chahi visuddhīhi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīraṃ
atk-s0301a:1110_0: Kasmā pana aññesu paropaññāsāya kusaladhammesu ekato uppajjamānesu saddhāva “bīja”nti vuttāti ce?
atk-s0301a:1110_2: Yathā hi tesu viññāṇaṃyeva vijānanakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a:1111_5: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa vassavuṭṭhisamanuggahitaṃ bījaṃ bījamūlakañca sassaṃ viruhati na milāyati nipphattiṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:1112_2: tapo me vuṭṭhī”ti tena kiṃ dīpeti? Yathā, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a:1112_3: tayā vapite khette sace vuṭṭhi atthi,
atk-s0301a:1112_7: Tathā mayā hiriīse paññāyuganaṅgale manoyottena ekābaddhe kate vīriyabalībadde yojetvā satipācanena vijjhitvā
atk-s0301a:1112_8: attano cittasantānakhettamhi saddhābīje vapite vuṭṭhiyā abhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a:1112_9: ayaṃ pana me niccakālaṃ indriyasaṃvaratapo vuṭṭhīti.
atk-s0301a:1113_1: Idha pana saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā.
atk-s0301a:1113_4: evaṃ bhagavato duvidhāpi vipassanā paññā ca.
atk-s0301a:1113_5: Tattha yathā yugaṃ īsāya upanissayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1113_9: evaṃ paññā hirippamukhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayā hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0301a:1113_13: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena purato ca hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0301a:1113_15: anvāyikā paññavato bhavantī”ti hirivippayogena anuppattito pana īsābaddho hoti.
atk-s0301a:1113_16: Manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassa nissayapaccayato yottānaṃ nissayo hoti.
atk-s0301a:1113_18: yathā ca naṅgalaṃ phālayuttaṃ kasanakāle pathavighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a:1113_20: evaṃ satiyuttā paññā vipassanākāle dhammānaṃ santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a:1114_1: Taggahaṇena tāya avippayuttaṃ ottappampi gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a:1114_3: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0301a:1114_4: evaṃ bhagavatopi hirī lokiyalokuttarapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāreti hiriabhāve paññāya abhāvato.
atk-s0301a:1114_5: Yathā ca īsāpaṭibaddhayuganaṅgalaṃ kiccakaraṃ hoti acalaṃ asithilaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1114_6: evaṃ hiripaṭibaddhā ca paññā kiccakārī hoti acalā asithilā abbokiṇṇā ahirikena.
atk-s0301a:1114_10: Idha pana manosīsena taṃsampayutto samādhi adhippeto.
atk-s0301a:1114_12: Taṃ tividhaṃ īsāya saha yugassa bandhanaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1114_15: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa yottaṃ īsāyugabalībadde ekābaddhe katvā sakakicce paṭipādeti,
atk-s0301a:1114_16: evaṃ bhagavato samādhi sabbeva te hiripaññāvīriyadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhepasabhāvena bandhitvā sakakicce paṭipādeti.
atk-s0301a:1115_7: evaṃ bhagavato vipassanāsampayuttā maggasampayuttā ca sati.
atk-s0301a:1115_10: evaṃ sati kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā ārammaṇe vā upaṭṭhāpayamānā paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0301a:1115_11: Tenevesā “satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu viya ārakkhāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a:1115_15: Yathā ca pācanaṃ balībaddānaṃ vijjhanabhayaṃ dassentaṃ saṃsīdituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a:1115_17: evaṃ sati vīriyabalībaddānaṃ apāyabhayaṃ dassentī kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a:1115_18: kāmaguṇasaṅkhāte agocare cāraṃ nivāretvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojentī uppathagamanaṃ vāreti.
atk-s0301a:1116_3: Āhāre udare yatoti ettha āhāramukhena sabbapaccayānaṃ gahitattā catubbidhepi paccaye yato saṃyato nirupakkilesoti attho.
atk-s0301a:1116_5: Udare yatoti udare yato saṃyato mitabhojī,
atk-s0301a:1116_10: bījaṃ vapitvā sassaparipālanatthaṃ kaṇṭakavatiṃ vā rukkhavatiṃ vā pākāraparikkhepaṃ vā karosi,
atk-s0301a:1116_11: tena te gomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā sassaṃ na vilumpanti,
atk-s0301a:1116_12: evamahampi taṃ saddhābījaṃ vapitvā nānappakārakusalasassaparipālanatthaṃ kāyavacīāhāraguttimayaṃ tividhaṃ parikkhepaṃ karomi,
atk-s0301a:1116_13: tena me rāgādiakusaladhammagomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā nānappakārakaṃ kusalasassaṃ na vilumpantīti.
atk-s0301a:1117_0: Saccaṃ karomi niddānanti ettha dvīhākārehi avisaṃvādanaṃ saccaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1117_5: “yathā tvaṃ bāhiraṃ kasiṃ katvā sassadūsakānaṃ tiṇānaṃ hatthena vā asitena vā niddānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a:1117_6: evaṃ ahampi ajjhattikaṃ kasiṃ katvā kusalasassadūsakānaṃ visaṃvādanatiṇānaṃ saccena niddānaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1117_8: Tena attasaññādīnaṃ tiṇānaṃ niddānaṃ karomīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1117_9: Atha vā niddānanti chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakanti attho.
atk-s0301a:1117_10: Yathā tvaṃ dāsaṃ vā kammakaraṃ vā niddānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a:1117_11: “niddehi tiṇānī”ti tiṇānaṃ chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a:1117_16: Iti imesu dvīsu vikappesu upayogenevattho yujjati.
atk-s0301a:1118_0: Soraccaṃ me pamocananti ettha yaṃ taṃ “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo”ti sīlameva “soracca”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1118_4: Taṃ hi sundare nibbāne ratattā “soracca”nti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:1118_7: yathā tava pamocanaṃ punapi sāyanhe vā dutiyadivase vā anāgatasaṃvacchare vā yojetabbato appamocanameva hoti,
atk-s0301a:1118_9: Na hi mama antarā mocanaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0301a:1118_10: Ahaṃ hi dīpaṅkaradasabalakālato paṭṭhāya paññānaṅgale vīriyabalībadde yojetvā kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0301a:1118_11: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākasiṃ kasanto tāva na muñciṃ,
atk-s0301a:1118_13: Yadā ca me sabbaṃ taṃ kālaṃ khepetvā bodhimūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinnassa sabbaguṇaparivāraṃ arahattaphalaṃ udapādi,
atk-s0301a:1119_0: Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti ettha vīriyanti kāyikacetasiko vīriyārambho.
atk-s0301a:1119_3: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa dhurāyaṃ dhorayhākaḍḍhitaṃ naṅgalaṃ bhūmighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a:1119_5: evaṃ bhagavato vīriyākaḍḍhitaṃ paññānaṅgalaṃ yathā vuttaṃ ghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a:1119_11: Iti yathā brāhmaṇassa ekekasmiṃ naṅgale catubalībaddapabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannuppannaṃ tiṇamūlaghātañceva sassasampattiñca sādheti,
atk-s0301a:1119_12: evaṃ bhagavato catusammappadhānavīriyabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannuppannaṃ akusalaghātañceva kusalasampattiñca sādheti.
atk-s0301a:1120_0: Yogakkhemādhivāhananti ettha yogehi khemattā nibbānaṃ yogakkhemaṃ nāma,
atk-s0301a:1120_5: yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ puratthimādīsu aññataradisābhimukhaṃ vāhīyati,
atk-s0301a:1120_8: Yathā tava naṅgalaṃ vahantaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ khettakoṭiṃ patvā puna nivattati,
atk-s0301a:1120_10: Yasmā vā tena tena maggena pahīnā kilesā na punappunaṃ pahātabbā honti,
atk-s0301a:1120_11: yathā tava naṅgalena chinnāni tiṇāni puna aparasmiṃ samaye chinditabbāni honti,
atk-s0301a:1120_16: Atha vā gacchati anivattanti nivattanarahitaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1120_19: Evaṃ gacchantañca yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ na taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a:1120_20: yattha gantvā kassako asoko virajo hutvā na socati.
atk-s0301a:1120_21: Etaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati yattha gantvā na socati.
atk-s0301a:1120_22: Yattha satipācanena etaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ codento gantvā mādiso kassako asoko virajo hutvā na socati,
atk-s0301a:1120_23: taṃ sabbasokasallasamugghātabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma asaṅkhataṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0301a:1121_0: Idāni nigamanaṃ karonto evamesā kasīti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1121_2: esā saddhābījā tapovuṭṭhiyā anuggahitā kasī paññāmayaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ hirimayañca īsaṃ manomayena yottena
atk-s0301a:1121_3: ekābaddhaṃ katvā paññānaṅgalena satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvā satipācanaṃ gahetvā kāyavacīāhāraguttiyā gopetvā
atk-s0301a:1121_4: saccaṃ niddānaṃ katvā soraccapamocanaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ yogakkhemābhimukhaṃ anivattantaṃ vāhantena
atk-s0301a:1121_5: kaṭṭhā kasī kammapariyosānaṃ catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pāpitā,
atk-s0301a:1121_10: Sā kho panesā kasī na mamevekassa amatapphalā hoti,
atk-s0301a:1121_11: atha kho yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā etaṃ kasiṃ kasati,
atk-s0301a:1121_12: so sabbopi etaṃ kasitvāna sabbadukkhā pamuccatīti.
atk-s0301a:1122_0: Evaṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena nibbānapariyosānaṃ katvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1122_2: “mama kasiphalaṃ bhuñjitvā punapi divaseyeva chāto hoti,
atk-s0301a:1122_4: tassa phalaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti ñatvā pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1122_5: Taṃ sabbaṃ tato parañca vuttatthamevāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1124_1: Dutiye odanena pūresīti attano atthāya sampāditena sūpabyañjanena odanena pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1124_2: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokentova taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā,
atk-s0301a:1124_17: Tāni kira tīṇi divasāni nirantaraṃ brāhmaṇassa gharadvāraṃ gacchantassa bhagavato antarā añño koci uṭṭhāya pattaṃ gahetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0301a:1125_0: Etadavocāti brāhmaṇo tīṇi divasāni pattaṃ pūretvā dentopi na saddhāya adāsi,
atk-s0301a:1125_1: “gharadvāraṃ āgantvā ṭhitassa pabbajitassa bhikkhāmattampi adatvā bhuñjatī”ti upārambhabhayena adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1125_2: Dadanto ca dve divasāni datvā kiñci avatvāva nivatto.
atk-s0301a:1125_4: Tatiyadivase pana adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto etaṃ “pakaṭṭhako”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a:1125_5: Bhagavāpi etaṃ vacanaṃ nicchārāpanatthameva yāva tatiyamagamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1126_0: Punappunaṃ ceva vapanti bījanti satthā brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0301a:1126_2: tvaṃ tīṇi divasāni piṇḍapātaṃ datvā osakkasi,
atk-s0301a:1126_3: punappunaṃ kātabbā nāma lokasmiṃ soḷasa dhammā”ti vatvā te dhamme dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a:1126_4: Tattha punappunaṃ ceva vapantīti ekasmiṃ sassavāre vuttaṃ “alamettāvatā”ti anosakkitvā aparāparesupi sassavāresu ca vapantiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1126_5: Punappunaṃ vassatīti na ekadivasaṃ vassitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a:1127_0: Yācakāti imasmiṃ pade satthā desanākusalatāya attānampi pakkhipitvā dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1127_2: Na hi te ekavārameva thanaṃ añchanti,
atk-s0301a:1127_4: Kilamati phandati cāti ayaṃ satto tena iriyāpathena kilamati ceva phandati ca.
atk-s0301a:1127_7: mataṃ mataṃ sattaṃ tattha punappunaṃ harantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1127_8: Maggañca laddhā apunabbhavāyāti apunabbhavāya maggo nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1128_0: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvāva soḷasa punappunadhamme desentena vutte.
atk-s0301a:1128_1: Etadavocāti desanāpariyosāne pasanno saddhiṃ puttadāramittañātivaggena bhagavato pāde vanditvā etaṃ “abhikkantaṃ bho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1130_2: Bhagavato kira chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontassa pasatamuggayūsādīni āhārayato dubbhojanena ceva dukkhaseyyāya ca udaravāto kuppi.
atk-s0301a:1130_3: Aparabhāge sambodhiṃ patvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi antarantarā so ābādho attānaṃ dassetiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1130_5: Upaṭṭhāko hotīti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anibaddhupaṭṭhākakāle upaṭṭhāko hoti.
atk-s0301a:1130_6: Tasmiṃ kira kāle satthuasītimahātheresu upaṭṭhāko abhūtapubbo nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a:1130_7: Nāgasamālo upavāno sunakkhatto cundo samaṇuddeso sāgato bodhi meghiyoti ime pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatupaṭṭhākā.
atk-s0301a:1130_8: Imasmiṃ pana kāle upavānatthero pātova uṭṭhāya pariveṇasammajjanaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ nhānodakapariyādanaṃ
atk-s0301a:1130_9: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā anugamananti sabbaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānamakāsi.
atk-s0301a:1130_10: Upasaṅkamīti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira vīsati vassāni niddhūmaṃ araññameva hoti,
atk-s0301a:1130_12: So ca brāhmaṇo uddhanapāḷiṃ bandhāpetvā mahācāṭiyo uddhanamāropetvā uṇhodakaṃ kāretvā,
atk-s0301a:1130_13: nhānīyacuṇṇādīhi saddhiṃ taṃ vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a:1130_14: Nhāyitukāmā tattha gantvā mūlaṃ datvā nhāyitvā gandhe vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0301a:1131_2: Pūjito pūjaneyyānanti idaṃ thero dasabalassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetumārabhi.
atk-s0301a:1131_3: Gilānabhesajjatthaṃ gatena kira gilānassa vaṇṇo kathetabboti vattametaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1131_4: Vaṇṇaṃ hi sutvā manussā sakkaccaṃ bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0301a:1131_6: Kathentena ca jhānavimokkhasamāpattimaggaphalāni ārabbha kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a:1131_7: “Sīlavā lajjī kukkuccako bahussuto āgamadharo vaṃsānurakkhako”ti evaṃ pana āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃyeva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a:1131_8: Pūjaneyyānanti asītimahātherā sadevakena lokena pūjetabbāti pūjaneyyā.
atk-s0301a:1131_11: Bhagavā tesaṃ pūjito sakkato apacito ca,
atk-s0301a:1131_12: iccassa taṃ guṇaṃ pakāsento thero evamāha.
atk-s0301a:1132_0: Phāṇitassa ca puṭanti mahantaṃ nicchārikaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1132_5: ito thokena udakena idaṃ phāṇitaṃ āloḷetvā nhānapariyosāne pātuṃ detha,
atk-s0301a:1132_7: iminā antoti evaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa phāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti vatvā therassa patte pakkhipitvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1133_0: Upasaṅkamīti tasmiṃ kira ābādhe paṭippassaddhe “devahitena tathāgatassa bhesajjaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1133_2: aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ brāhmaṇassā”ti kathā vitthāritā jātā.
atk-s0301a:1133_3: Taṃ sutvā kittikāmo brāhmaṇo “ettakenapi tāva me ayaṃ kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti somanassajāto attanā katabhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a:1133_4: jānāpetukāmo tāvatakeneva dasabale vissāsaṃ āpajjitvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:1134_1: Kathaṃ hi yajamānassāti kena kāraṇena yajantassa.
atk-s0301a:1134_8: Abhiññāvositoti jānitvā vosito vosānaṃ katakiccataṃ patto.
atk-s0301a:1134_9: Evaṃ hi yajamānassāti iminā khīṇāsave yajanākārena yajantassa. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1136_4: So catunnaṃ puttānaṃ āvāhaṃ katvā cattāri satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1136_9: Te cattāropi paṇītehi ghāsacchādanādīhi upaṭṭhahantā hatthapādasambāhanādīni karontā saṅgaṇhitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0301a:1136_10: divā niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāde sambāhamānā pāṭiyekkaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ vatvā –
atk-s0301a:1136_13: Brāhmaṇo puna ekekassa satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ datvā attano nivatthapārupanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0301a:1137_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nhatvā āgacchantaṃ dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suṇhā evamāha –
atk-s0301a:1137_1: “kiṃ tayā jeṭṭhaputtassa sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā atirekaṃ dinnamatthi?
atk-s0301a:1137_2: Nanu sabbesaṃ dve dve satasahassāni dinnāni,
atk-s0301a:1137_3: kiṃ sesaputtānaṃ gharassa maggaṃ na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0301a:1137_4: So “nassa vasalī”ti kujjhitvā aññassa gharaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0301a:1137_5: tatopi katipāhaccayena imināva upāyena palāpito aññassāti evaṃ ekagharepi pavesanaṃ alabhamāno paṇḍaraṅgapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0301a:1137_6: pabbajitvā bhikkhāya caranto kālānamaccayena jarājiṇṇo dubbhojanadukkhaseyyāhi milātasarīro bhikkhācārato āgamma,
atk-s0301a:1137_7: pīṭhakāya nipanno niddaṃ okkamitvā vuṭṭhāya nisinno attānaṃ oloketvā puttesu patiṭṭhaṃ apassanto cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1137_8: “samaṇo kira gotamo abbhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0301a:1137_9: sakkā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ labhitu”nti nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bhikkhābhājanamādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a:1138_0: Dārehi saṃpuccha gharā nikkhāmentīti sabbaṃ mama santakaṃ gahetvā mayhaṃ niddhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano
atk-s0301a:1138_1: bhariyāhi saddhiṃ mantayitvā maṃ gharā nikkaḍḍhāpenti.
atk-s0301a:1139_2: Sāva vārenti sūkaranti yathā sunakhā vaggavaggā hutvā bhussantā bhussantā sūkaraṃ vārenti,
atk-s0301a:1139_4: evaṃ dārehi saddhiṃ maṃ bahuṃ vatvā viravantaṃ palāpentīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1140_4: Vayogatanti tayo vaye gataṃ atikkantaṃ pacchimavaye ṭhitaṃ maṃ.
atk-s0301a:1141_1: Khādanā apanīyatīti asso hi yāvadeva taruṇo hoti javasampanno,
atk-s0301a:1141_5: gāvīhi saddhiṃ aṭaviyaṃ sukkhatiṇāni khādanto carati.
atk-s0301a:1141_7: evaṃ jiṇṇakāle viluttasabbadhanattā nibbhogo mādisopi bālakānaṃ pitā thero paragharesu bhikkhati.
atk-s0301a:1142_2: ye mama puttā anassavā appatissā avasavattino,
atk-s0301a:1142_4: Idānissa seyyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ caṇḍampi goṇantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1143_1: taṃ purato katvā gantuṃ sukhaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1143_2: Gādhamedhatīti udakaṃ otaraṇakāle gambhīre udake patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a:1144_1: Sannisinnesūti tathārūpe brāhmaṇānaṃ samāgamadivase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu puttesu taṃ sabhaṃ ogāhetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe mahārahe āsane nisinnesu.
atk-s0301a:1144_2: Abhāsīti ‘ayaṃ me kālo’ti sabhāya majjhe pavisitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā,
atk-s0301a:1144_6: “Tena ca samayena manussānaṃ vattaṃ hoti yo mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khādanto mātāpitaro na poseti,
atk-s0301a:1144_8: Tasmā te brāhmaṇaputtā pitupādesu nipatitvā “jīvitaṃ no tāta,
atk-s0301a:1144_10: So pituhadayassa puttānaṃ muduttā “mā me, bho,
atk-s0301a:1145_1: ajja paṭṭhāya pitaraṃ na sammā paṭijaggissatha,
atk-s0301a:1145_4: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho naṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1145_5: Tattha netvāti pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ ukkhipitvā nayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1145_6: Nhāpetvāti sarīraṃ telena abbhañjitvā ubbaṭṭetvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1146_0: Brāhmaṇo subhojanañca sukhaseyyañca āgamma katipāhaccayena sañjātabalo pīṇitindriyo attabhāvaṃ oloketvā,
atk-s0301a:1146_1: “ayaṃ me sampatti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya laddhā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1146_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho sotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1146_3: Tattha etadavocāti dussayugaṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a:1146_11: bho”ti kho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā gharaṃ gantvā putte āmantesi “tātā,
atk-s0301a:1146_14: tumhe tasmiṃ sampatte mā pamajjathā”ti. Sādhu, tātāti.
atk-s0301a:1146_15: Punadivase bhagavā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaraṃ ādāya jeṭṭhaputtassa nivesanadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:1146_16: So satthāraṃ disvāva hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ pavesetvā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā paṇītabhojanamadāsi.
atk-s0301a:1146_18: punadivase itarassāti paṭipāṭiyā sabbesaṃ gharāni agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1147_5: Tena hi tumhe pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ svātanāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantethāti.
atk-s0301a:1147_7: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1147_8: So haritupalittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ gehaṃ satthāraṃ pavesetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paññattāsanesu
atk-s0301a:1147_10: Antarabhattasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇassa cattāropi puttā satthu santike nisīditvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0301a:1147_15: mātāpituposakaṃ nāma porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ āciṇṇamevā”ti vatvā mahānāgajātakaṃ nāma kathetvā,
atk-s0301a:1147_17: Desanāpariyosāne brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ catūhi puttehi catūhi ca suṇhāhi desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0301a:1147_18: Tato paṭṭhāya satthā na sabbakālaṃ tesaṃ gehaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0301a:1149_1: Pañcame mānatthaddhoti vātabharitabhastā viya mānena thaddho.
atk-s0301a:1149_2: Ācariyanti sippuggahaṇakāle ācariyo anabhivādentassa sippaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a:1149_3: aññasmiṃ pana kāle taṃ na abhivādeti,
atk-s0301a:1149_6: “yasmā ayaṃ samaṇo mādise jātisampannabrāhmaṇe sampatte paṭisanthāramattampi na karoti,
atk-s0301a:1150_3: Apacitā assūti apacitiṃ dassetuṃ yuttā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1150_4: Arahanteti imāya gāthāya desanākusalattā attānaṃ antokatvā pūjaneyyaṃ dasseti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1152_1: Chaṭṭhe “sabbaṃ seta”nti vutte “sabbaṃ kaṇha”ntiādinā nayena paccanīkaṃ karontassevassa sātaṃ sukhaṃ hotīti paccanīkasāto.
atk-s0301a:1152_2: Yo ca vineyya sārambhanti yo karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ sārambhaṃ vinetvā suṇātīti attho. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1154_1: Sattame navakammikabhāradvājoti so kira araññe rukkhaṃ chindāpetvā tattheva pāsādakūṭāgārādīni yojetvā nagaraṃ āharitvā vikkiṇāti,
atk-s0301a:1154_4: Disvānassa etadahosīti chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjetvā nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvāna assa etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1154_6: Ucchinnamūlaṃ me vananti mayhaṃ kilesavanaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1154_9: Aratiṃ vippahāyāti pantasenāsanesu ceva bhāvanāya ca ukkaṇṭhitaṃ jahitvā. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1156_1: Aṭṭhame antevāsikāti veyyāvaccaṃ katvā sippuggaṇhanakā dhammantevāsikā.
atk-s0301a:1157_4: Sucārurūpaṃ vatāti atisundaraṃ vata jhānaṃ jhāyasīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1158_1: Idanti idaṃ tumhākaṃ evaṃ vane nisinnakāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ accherarūpaṃ paṭibhāti.
atk-s0301a:1159_4: Kasmā bhavaṃ vijanamaraññamassitoti ahaṃ tāva brahmalokaṃ ākaṅkhamānoti maññāmi.
atk-s0301a:1159_9: Idha idaṃ tapo kasmā karosīti aparenapi ākārena pucchati.
atk-s0301a:1160_7: idampi mayha”nti pajappāpanavasena pajappitā nāmāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a:1160_8: Sabbā mayā byantikatāti sabbā taṇhā mayā aggamaggena vigatantā nirantā katā.
atk-s0301a:1161_1: Sabbesu dhammesu visuddhadassanoti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0301a:1165_5: Sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatīti so ve bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu nāma vuccati. Dasamaṃ.

atk-s0301a:1169_6: ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca upasaṅkamissāmī”ti adhiṭṭhānavasena vuṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0301a:1169_7: Sabhādhammanti sukhanisinne kira asañcāletvā ekapassena pavisanaṃ tesaṃ sabhādhammo nāma,

atk-s0301a:1169_13: Pahāyāti ete rāgādayo jahitvā rāgādivinayāya dhammaṃ bhaṇanti,
atk-s0301a:1178_1: Vaṅgīsasaṃyuttassa paṭhame aggāḷave cetiyeti āḷaviyaṃ aggacetiye.
atk-s0301a:1178_4: Uppanne buddhe tāni apanetvā manussā vihāre kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1178_8: Vihārapāloti so kira tadā avassiko hoti pattacīvaraggahaṇe akovido.
atk-s0301a:1178_10: imāni chattupāhanakattarayaṭṭhiādīni olokento nisīdā”ti vihārarakkhakaṃ katvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1178_14: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti etasmiṃ rāge uppanne taṃ kāraṇaṃ kuto labbhā.
atk-s0301a:1178_15: Yaṃ me paroti yena me kāraṇena añño puggalo vā dhammo vā anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā idāneva abhiratiṃ uppādeyya ācariyupajjhāyāpi maṃ vihāre ohāya gatā.
atk-s0301a:1179_6: Sahassaṃ apalāyinanti ye te samantā sarehi parikireyyuṃ,
atk-s0301a:1179_9: Neva maṃ byādhayissantīti maṃ cāletuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0301a:1179_10: Dhamme samhi patiṭṭhitanti anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā abhiratiṃ uppādanasamatthe sake sāsanadhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1179_12: issāsasahasse tāva samantā sarehi parikirante sikkhito puriso daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā sabbe sare sarīre apatamāne antarāva paharitvā pādamūle pāteti.
atk-s0301a:1179_13: Tattha ekopi issāso dve sare ekato na khipati,
atk-s0301a:1179_14: imā pana itthiyo rūpārammaṇādivasena pañca pañca sare ekato khipanti.
atk-s0301a:1179_15: Evaṃ khipantiyo etā sacepi atirekasahassā honti,
atk-s0301a:1180_0: Sakkhī hi me sutaṃ etanti mayā hi sammukhā etaṃ sutaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1180_4: Tattha meti tasmiṃ me attano taruṇavipassanāsaṅkhāte nibbānagamanamagge mano nirato.
atk-s0301a:1180_7: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti yathā me bhavayoniādīsu gatamaggampi na passasi,
atk-s0301a:1182_2: Aparajju vā kāleti dutiyadivase vā bhikkhācārakāle.
atk-s0301a:1182_4: Aratiñca ratiñcāti sāsane aratiṃ kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ.
atk-s0301a:1182_5: Sabbaso gehasitañca vitakkanti pañcakāmaguṇagehanissitaṃ pāpavitakkañca sabbākārena pahāya.
atk-s0301a:1184_4: Paṭighe ca mute cāti ettha paṭighapadena gandharasā gahitā,
atk-s0301a:1184_6: Yo ettha na limpatīti yo etesu pañcakāmaguṇesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati.
atk-s0301a:1185_1: puthū janatāya adhammā niviṭṭhāti atha cha ārammaṇanissitā puthū adhammavitakkā janatāya niviṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0301a:1185_2: Na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñcīti tesaṃ vasena na katthaci kilesavaggagato bhaveyya.
atk-s0301a:1185_3: No pana duṭṭhullabhāṇīti duṭṭhullavacanabhāṇīpi na siyā.
atk-s0301a:1185_4: Sa bhikkhūti so evaṃvidho bhikkhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a:1186_6: Paṭicca parinibbuto kaṅkhati kālanti nibbānaṃ paṭicca kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto parinibbānakālaṃ āgameti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1188_5: amhākaṃ pana pāḷipi aṭṭhakathāpi nayasatena nayasahassena upaṭṭhātī”ti atikkamitvā maññati.
atk-s0301a:1188_12: Akhilodha padhānavāti akhilo idha padhānavā vīriyasampanno.
atk-s0301a:1190_1: Catutthe rāgoti āyasmā ānando mahāpuñño sambhāvito,
atk-s0301a:1190_3: Sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitāpi itthiyo theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tālavaṇṭena bījenti,
atk-s0301a:1190_5: Tattha āyasmato vaṅgīsassa navapabbajitassa ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkontassa itthirūpārammaṇe rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti.
atk-s0301a:1190_6: So saddhāpabbajitattā ujujātiko kulaputto “ayaṃ me rāgo vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāseyyā”ti
atk-s0301a:1190_7: cintetvā anantaraṃ nisinnova therassa attānaṃ āvikaronto kāmarāgenātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1191_4: Mā ca attatoti attato mā passa.
atk-s0301a:1191_6: Animittañca bhāvehīti niccādīnaṃ nimittānaṃ ugghāṭitattā vipassanā animittā nāma,
atk-s0301a:1191_8: Mānābhisamayāti mānassa dassanābhisamayā ceva pahānābhisamayā ca.
atk-s0301a:1193_11: “Yā pana vācāya ce kataṃ kamma”nti evaṃ viññatti ca “yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati…pe…
atk-s0301a:1193_12: ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti evaṃ virati ca,
atk-s0301a:1193_15: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī”ti evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgatā,
atk-s0301a:1194_0: Subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya catūsu vācaṅgesu aññataraniddosavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1194_4: Aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ panettha abhāsitabbaṃ pubbe avatvā bhāsitabbamevāha.
atk-s0301a:1194_6: Ettha ca paṭhamena pisuṇadosarahitaṃ samaggakaraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1194_9: Imehi khoti ādinā tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0301a:1194_12: liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakasampattīhi ca samannāgataṃ musāvādādivācampi subhāsitanti maññanti,
atk-s0301a:1194_14: Avayavādisamannāgatāpi hi tathārūpī vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano ca paresañca anatthāvahattā.
atk-s0301a:1194_15: Imehi pana catūhaṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
atk-s0301a:1194_17: Tathā hi maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇayuttaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā
atk-s0301a:1194_18: saddaṃ sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1194_19: Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto padumasare padumāni bhañjitvā –
atk-s0301a:1196_0: Evaṃ manussattaṃ gatā sattā, jarābhivegena maddiyantī”ti. –
atk-s0301a:1197_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0301a:1198_0: Buddhantarepi aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ aṭavito āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā –
atk-s0301a:1203_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ sutvā paccavekkhanto saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto.
